YXmavt:1: uttamajano hi prāyaśo guruṃ śraddhādevatāṃ cābhyarcyakarmasu pravartata
YXmavt:3: cikīrṣustatpraṇeturvaktuś ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā tadarthavibhāgāya prayukta
YXmavt:25: atra sūtrārtho'bhrāntam upadiṣṭa iti vṛttau gauravam utpadyate /
YXmavt:26: evaṃ ye pudgalaṃ pramāṇīkurvanti teṣāṃ sūtravṛttyo gauravotpattiḥ /
YXmavt:27: ye ca dharmānusāriṇas teṣāṃ sūtravṛttyoḥ śubhārthā'vabodhaḥ /
YXmavt:28: jāte ca niścaye iyaṃ praṇeturvaktuś ca pratītyā prabhāvanā na tu
YXmavt:32: śāstraṃ kim iti cet nāma-pada-vyañjanakāyaprabhāsā vijñaptayaḥ
YXmavt:46: etac ca dvayam api sarvasmin mahāyāne sarvasmiṃś ca tad vyākhyāne
YXmavt:59: yadyapy ayaṃ dhātuḥ prāpaṇārthas tathāpi pra-śabdasaṃyogāt
YXmavt:65: suṣṭhu gataḥ savāsana kleśāvaraṇāj jñeyāvaraṇāc cāpratiṣṭhitaṃ
YXmavt:76: evaṃ sati bodhisattvasya daśamyāṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhitasya sarvākāraṃ
YXmavt:80: atra hi sugatātmajasya śāstrapraṇetur avabodhasampat pradarśitā
YXmavt:87: tasya hīdaṃ śāstram abhivyaktaṃ ākhyātaṃ cāryamaitreyādhiṣṭhānāt
YXmavt:90: anyān api buddhabodhisattvānarcayitvā na kevalaṃ praṇetāraṃ
YXmavt:99: śāstrasya praṇetāraṃ vaktāraṃ cābhyarcya kiṃ kariṣyasītyāha -
YXmavt:105: ete saptārthā hyasmin śāstra upadiśyanta iti vacanāt /
YXmavt:112: antarvyāpārapuruṣarahitatā ca dharmanairātmyam ityatas tat pratiṣedhena
YXmavt:125: taccharīraṃ saṃkṣepaḥ piṇḍārtho vāśrayārthena vā śarīraṃ /
YXmavt:126: yathā hi bāhyādhyātmikāyatanāśrayaḥ kāyaḥ śarīram ity ucyate evaṃ
YXmavt:127: yānarthān niścitya śāstraṃ pravartate te'rthās tasya śarīraṃ /
YXmavt:130: nanu śāstrāvabhodhenaiva taccharīraṃ vijñāsyata iti nirarthakam ādau
YXmavt:133: gatārtho hi śiṣyaḥ sukhaṃ vistaram ucyamānaṃ pratipādyate /
YXmavt:151: yadi lakṣyante'neneti laksaṇam ityevaṃ sati lakṣaṇasya
YXmavt:154: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātuḥ kharalakṣaṇo na ca kharatvāt pṛthivīdhātuḥ
YXmavt:156: atha vā lakṣyate tad iti lakṣaṇaṃ /
YXmavt:157: evaṃ hi saṅkleśo vyavadānañca saṅkleśavyavadānātmatvena lakṣyata iti
YXmavt:159: atha vā dvayoḥ saṅkleśavyavadānayor lakṣaṇaṃ dvividhaṃ svalakṣaṇañca
YXmavt:166: tadevedaṃ tat tasya bhāvas tattvam aviparyāsa ityarthaḥ /
YXmavt:184: tataḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yasya yad āvaraṇaṃ tasya taj jñeyaṃ /
YXmavt:185: tasyāprahāṇād vimukter asambhavād avijñānañca prahātuṃ na śakyate
YXmavt:187: tatas tadāvaraṇād yenālambanena cittaṃ vimucyate tatttvaṃ veditavyaṃ /
YXmavt:188: tatastenālambhanenatadāvaraṇasya yena prayogena kṣayo bhavati sā
YXmavt:192: tato lokottaradharmābhimukhīkaraṇaṃ phalāni srota apatti phalādīni
YXmavt:206: tat prahāṇopāyapradarśanārthaṃ tataḥ saparivāraḥ pratipakṣo mārgaḥ /
YXmavt:210: etac ca sarvaṃ bodhisattvasya śrāvakādisādhāraṇam ity
YXmavt:214: lakṣaṇaṃ jñātvāvaraṇaṃ prahātavyaṃ tattvaṃ ca sākṣāt kartavyam iti tad
YXmavt:216: tayoś ca prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇayor ayam upāya iti pratipakṣabhāvanā /
YXmavt:219: tad anantaraṃ yānānuttaryam iti prakāśanārtham ayam anukrama iti /
YXmavt:223: tenāvṛtaṃ tattvam iti tattvakauśalārthaṃ tad anantaraṃ tattvaṃ /
YXmavt:227: avasthayāṃ phalaṃ prabhāvitavyam ityavasthānantaraṃ phalaṃ tat
YXmavt:229: sarvam etan mahāyānamāgamyeti yānānuttaryam ante nirdiṣṭaṃ //1-1//
YXmavt:232: śūnyatā vidyate tv atra tasyām api sa vidyate // iti /
YXmavt:236: lakṣaṇañca prāg uddiṣṭamatastasyaiva śeṣebhyo nirdeśaḥ prāgārabhyate /
YXmavt:237: kecit virundhanti sarvadharmāḥ sarvathā niḥsvabhāvāḥ śaśaviśāṇavad
YXmavt:241: nanv evaṃ sūtravirodhaḥ - sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti śāstre vacanāt /
YXmavt:244: abhūtaparikalpo hi grāhyagrāhakasvarūparahitaḥ śūnya ucyate na tu
YXmavt:252: iyam eva hi -śūnyatā yā grāhagrāhakarahitatā'bhūtaparikalpasyeti na
YXmavt:254: yadyadvayā śūnyatā sā cābhūtaparikalpe'sti kasmād vayamamuktāḥ /
YXmavt:255: vidyamānā ca kasmān na gṛhyata iti saṃśayāpanayanārthaṃ -
YXmavt:258: yasmācchūnyatāyām apyabhūtaparikalpo vidyate tasmād bhavanto na
YXmavt:260: ata eva ca samalatvān na prasannābdhātavad gṛhyate /
YXmavt:261: atha vā cittacaittebhyo'nyatra rūpādayo dravyatvena santīti yad darśanaṃ
YXmavt:265: nāsti rūpaṃ tad vyatiriktaṃ dravyata iti /
YXmavt:269: na hy abhūtaparikalpaḥ kasyacid grāhako nāpi kenacit gṛhyate /
YXmavt:271: yato vijñānād bahī rūpādayo na gṛhyante /
YXmavt:273: na ca yad yasya kāraṇaṃ tad abhāve tasyotpattir yujyate /
YXmavt:275: anyatrāpi svabījaparipākād arthābhāsaṃ vijñānam utpadyate ity
YXmavt:277: grāhyābhāve grāhakasyābhāvād grāhye'sati grāhako bhavituṃ na
YXmavt:279: tasmān na rūpam abhūtaparikalpāt pṛthag asti /
YXmavt:286: yady abhūtaparikalpe'sti sā vidyamānā kimarthaṃ na gṛhyate /
YXmavt:287: abhūtaparikalpāvṛtatvān na gṛhyata ākāśanairmalyavat na tu asattvād
YXmavt:292: na sarvam asat nāpi sadātmakaṃ vijñānapariṇāmāatmanā'stīti kṛtvā /
YXmavt:293: ye tu manyante yathaiva rūpādayaḥ prakhyāyante tathiavābhūtaparikalpāt
YXmavt:294: svabhāvataḥ pṛthag vidyanta iti tān pratyāha
YXmavt:298: kenacit dvayor abhāvo vo vnadhyāputravat cheda rūpo gṛhyate /
YXmavt:306: na hyaviśodhitāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ mokṣo'sti saṅkliṣṭā ca mahatā yatnena
YXmavt:308: atha vā lakṣaṇaṃ saṅkleśavyavadānābhidhānād anyan nāstītyataḥ
YXmavt:322: atra ca śūnyatāprabhāvitatvāt mārganirodhayor api grahaṇamṃ veditavyaṃ
YXmavt:323: saṅkleśapakṣād eva vyavadānapakṣo mārgayitavyo na punaḥ pṛthaktvam
YXmavt:325: yadi dvayaṃ nāsti kathaṃ tasyāṃ vidyamānāyāṃ loko bhrānta ityāha -
YXmavt:330: abhūtavacanena ca yathā'yaṃ parikalpyate grāhyagrāhakatvena tathā
YXmavt:332: parikalpavacanena tvartho yathā parikalpyate tathārtho na vidhyate iti
YXmavt:334: evam asya grāhyagrāhakavinirmuktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
YXmavt:348: na tv abhūtaparikalpo'pyabhāvaḥ yathā śūnyā rajjuḥ sarpasvabhāvenātat
YXmavt:349: svabhāvatvāt sarvakālaṃ śūnyā na tu rajju svabhāvena tathehāpi /
YXmavt:350: tasyām api sa vidyata iti abhūtaparikalpaḥ /
YXmavt:351: evaṃ hy āgantukāvaraṇopakliṣṭatvāt tad agrahaṇam uktam abdhātvādivad iti /
YXmavt:352: evaṃ yad yatra nāsti tat tena śūnyam iti yathābhūtaṃ samanupaśyatīti /
YXmavt:364: yac chūnyaṃ tasya sad bhāvāt yena śūnyaṃ tasya tatrābhāvāt /
YXmavt:372: anyena hy anyasya śūunyatā dṛṣṭā yathā bhikṣubhir vihārasya /
YXmavt:374: yathā rajjur māyā vā svātmany avidyamānena sarpākāreṇa puruṣādinā
YXmavt:376: tatra kasyacid grāhanirvartanārthaṃ sarpapuruṣādibhiś ca śūnyety ucyate
YXmavt:378: prakhyāyamāno bālānāṃ tad grāhābhiniveśaty ājanārthaṃ dvayena
YXmavt:381: kim artham asau śloka ārabdha iti ?
YXmavt:383: evaṃ ca hyekāntapratikṣepeṇa sarvam idaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāśūnyam iti
YXmavt:392: sattvād abhūtaparikalpasya na saṃskṛtaṃ śūnyam abhūtaparikalpātmatvena
YXmavt:395: śūnyātāyās tu sarvam abhūtaparikalpe tad dharmateti kṛtvā /
YXmavt:397: evam asaṃskṛtam api dharmatārūpeṇa na śūnyaṃ /
YXmavt:399: sā ca madhyamā pratipad iti ratnakūṭādimadhye'stīti kāśyapāyam
YXmavt:402: yadetayor dvayor antayor madhyamiyam ucyate kāśyapa madhyamā pratipad
YXmavt:403: dharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣeti sā madhyamā pratipadevam anulomitā /
YXmavt:405: naikāntena śūnyam ity abhūtaparikalpasya tac chūnyatāyāś ca [p.14]
YXmavt:410: evam abhūtaparikalpasya sal lakṣaṇam asallakṣaṇañca khyāpayitveti /
YXmavt:411: idaṃ sattvena lakṣyata iti sattvam eva sallakṣaṇaṃ /
YXmavt:414: evam asattvena lakṣyata iti asatvam evāsal lakṣaṇāt /
YXmavt:416: yasmād abhūtaparikalpe dvayaṃ nāsti tasmād abhūtaparikalpo'pi
YXmavt:426: vijñānaṃ nāsti cā'syārthas tadabhāvāt tadapyasat // iti /
YXmavt:434: atha vā 'bhūtaparikalpo'stītyanena tat sattvamātraṃ jñāyate na tu
YXmavt:436: dvayābhāve'pi yad grāhyagrāhakābhiniveśakāraṇaṃ na vijñāyate dvayaṃ
YXmavt:437: ca nāstīti yataḥ pratīyate tad api noktam ityatas tat pratipādanārtham
YXmavt:445: nāsti cāsyārthas tadabhāvāt tad apyasat / iti /
YXmavt:460: na hi puruṣe'sati sthāṇuḥ puruṣābhāso bhavatīti /
YXmavt:462: arthādyābhāsaṃ hi vijñānaṃ bālā vijñānāt pṛthag
YXmavt:465: vijñānam evedam arthādyābhāsam utpadyate taimirikāṇām iva
YXmavt:467: evaṃ cāṣṭavijñānavastukaḥ paratantro'bhūtaparikalpa ity uktaṃ bhavati /
YXmavt:473: tais teṣu vā sajjata iti sattvaḥ /
YXmavt:475: ātmapratibhāsaṃ kliṣṭaṃ manaḥ ātmamohādisamprayogād iti kliṣṭasya
YXmavt:488: na tv anyayor grāhakarūpeṇa prakhyānād anākāraḥ /
YXmavt:494: tac ca tayor nāstīty upalabdhyabhāvād anākāraḥ /
YXmavt:495: yadyubhayam apy anākāraṃ parasparabhinnasvarūpac ca rūpādivac
YXmavt:497: rūpādibhyaścakṣurādibhyaś ca vijñānasya ko'sāvātmātiśayo yatas tān
YXmavt:498: nirākritya tair abhinnarūpaṃ vijñānaṃ gṛhyate tad
YXmavt:504: ubhayataḥ purusaiḥ saṃrakṣyamāṇāḥ paśyanti manuṣYādayaḥ punaḥ
YXmavt:508: tathā pṛthivyādi kṛtsneṣu sarvaṃ pṛthivayādibhir vyāptaṃ paśyati /
YXmavt:511: tasmāt tad arthamantareṇa sarvam arthasattvādinirbhāsaṃ vijñānam eva
YXmavt:515: atha vā yathā vijñānenārthaḥ parikalpyate tathārthasyābhāvo
YXmavt:517: tathā hi vijñaptir api vijñapty antaraparikalpitenātmanā śūnyeti
YXmavt:522: tasmād arthābhāvād vijñātṛtvena vijñānam asad na [p.17]
YXmavt:526: tad bhinnasvabhāve sati tad vijñānaṃ kathaṃ yujyeta kathaṃ parasparaṃ
YXmavt:531: iti tat prasiddham iti pradarśayann āha -
YXmavt:534: ata ity anantaroktād hetorarthābhāvāt tad apy asad iti punar apy
YXmavt:542: na tathā'stitvān na ca sarvathā nāstitvāt tad
YXmavt:544: tatra catuḥprakāre'py anākāratvād vitathākāratvāc ca yathāsambhavaṃ
YXmavt:548: na ca sarvathā'bhāvo bhrāntimātrasyotpādād ityātmatvenābhāvo na tu
YXmavt:549: yadākāreṇa pratibhāsate tena bhrāntir ucyare māyāvat /
YXmavt:553: kimartha punas tasya bhrāntivijñānasyā'bhāva eva neṣyate
YXmavt:555: na hi kenacit tasyāstitvaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate
YXmavt:560: kiṃ tarhi saṅkleśavyavadānapakṣasāmarthāt tad astitvam anumīyate / [p.18]
YXmavt:561: anyatheti yadi tasya sarvathābhāva eveṣyate na bandho na mokṣa iti /
YXmavt:563: pūrvaṃ baddho mucyata iti kṛtvā muktir api na syāt /
YXmavt:564: atha vā kathaṃ na yathā prakhyāti tathā bhāveneṣyate sarvathā
YXmavt:568: anyathā hi na bandho na mokṣa iti saṅkleśavyavadānāpavādadoṣaḥ syāt /
YXmavt:569: yathā grāhyagrāhakatvena bhrāntir udbhāsitā'pi yadi tathā syāt
YXmavt:570: paramārthata evaṃ sati nityaḥ saṅkleśaḥ syāt /
YXmavt:572: evaṃ ca bhrāntimātrasyāpy abhāve saṅkleśābhāvo nityañca vyavadānaṃ
YXmavt:574: evaṃ cobhayathāpi mokṣārthināṃ vyartho yatnaḥ syāt /
YXmavt:577: atha vā yena saṅgraho lakṣyate tat saṅgrahalakṣaṇaṃ /
YXmavt:581: ataḥ sūtrāntarair avirodhapradarśanārthaṃ teṣām iha saṅgraha ucyate /
YXmavt:584: kalpitaḥ paratantraś ca pariniṣpanna eva ca /
YXmavt:585: arthād abhūtakalpāc ca dvayābhāvāc ca deśitaḥ // iti /
YXmavt:586: grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ ca svabhāvaśūnyatvād abhūtam apy astitvena
YXmavt:589: sa punar dravyato'sannapi vyavahārato'stīti svabhāva ucyate /
YXmavt:601: arthaḥ parikalpitaḥ svabhāva ityartho'tra rūpādayaścakṣurādaya ātmā
YXmavt:603: sa ca kalpitena svabhāvenābhūtaparikalpe nāstīty asan parikalpitaḥ
YXmavt:609: parair hetupratyayais tantryate janyate na tu svayambhavatīti paratantraḥ /
YXmavt:613: atra hy abhūtaparikalpasya dvayarahitatā grāhyagrāhakābhāva uktaḥ /
YXmavt:616: sa eva grāhyagrāhakarūpeṇa svātmany avidyamānena prakhyānāt
YXmavt:621: parijñāya sākṣāt kartavyañca vastu sandarśitaṃ bhavati //1-6// [p.20]
YXmavt:636: rūpādyābhāsaṃ vijñānaṃ pravartate na tu rūpādiko'rtho'stītyevaṃ
YXmavt:642: na ca viṣayapratibhāsātmanotpattim uktvā vijñānasyānyā kriyā'sti
YXmavt:643: yāṃ kriyāṃ kurvat vijñānaṃ viṣayam ālambana ity ucyate /
YXmavt:644: yadi vālambanasya vartamāna eva vijñāne vyāpāro notpadyamāne evam
YXmavt:650: ātmātiśayasyānyata eva darśanād anyadevotpannam ālambanaṃ gṛhṇātīti
YXmavt:654: sa ca svākārapratibhāsa jñānakāraṇatvena śeṣebhyaḥ pratyayebhyo
YXmavt:659: sarvam eva hi vijñānaṃ ghaṭapaṭādipratibhāsam utpadyate na tu
YXmavt:663: yo'pi manyate samuditāḥ paramāṇava ālambanaṃ na pratyekaṃ tasyāpy ayam
YXmavt:665: samuditā api hi te pratyekam evālambanatveneṣYante na tat samudāyena /
YXmavt:666: tatra paramāṇūnāṃ pratyekapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ notpadyate nāpi tat
YXmavt:672: atha ca niruddha ālambanaṃ evaṃ satyātītānāgataṃ viṣayaḥ syāt /
YXmavt:673: svapnādau tu vijñānam anālambanam iti siddhaṃ /
YXmavt:676: na hi svapnādāvasatyarthe tannimittaṃ yujyate mukhādyabhāve tat
YXmavt:678: utpadyamānam utpannaṃ vālambanaṃ vijñānanimittam abhāvān nirodhāc
YXmavt:683: anākāre hi tasmin grāhyagrāhakaniyama eva na syāt /
YXmavt:684: anyastvapratighaṃ rūpameva svapne yogināṃ cāśubhādāvālambanaṃ manyate
YXmavt:687: na cāvijñaptimātrād anyad apratighaṃ rūpaṃ śāstre varṇyate /
YXmavt:689: aparastv anubhūtārtham eva svapne vijñānaviṣayatvenecchati jātyandhena
YXmavt:691: na jātyandhaḥ svapne rūpaṃ na gṛhṇāti /
YXmavt:692: avyutpannasaṅketatvāt tu nāmato na jānāty ato nānyasyācaṣṭe /
YXmavt:693: yadi cānubhūtasyaiva svapne darśanam evaṃ jātyandhasyāpi rūpadarśanaṃ
YXmavt:698: na hy atītānāgatavartamānānubhave suptasya jāgrataś ca kaścid
YXmavt:700: tasmāt parikalpamātram evaitad anubhūtārthaviṣayaṃ svapne vijñānam iti
YXmavt:701: / atītasya cābhāvān nirviṣayaṃ vijñānam eva svapne'rthābhāsam
YXmavt:706: yatha na vijṇyanād bahiḥ parikalpitaṃ grāhyamastīti
YXmavt:713: kim arthaṃ punaḥ prathamata eva vijñaptimātrasyaivābhāvaṃ na
YXmavt:721: tathā hi vijñaptimātram idaṃ niśritya rūpānupalambhānukūlo
YXmavt:731: tatraiva ca sarvatragadharmadhātvadhigamāt prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ praviśatīti
YXmavt:738: atha vā yat pūrvaṃ pratijñātam abhūtaparikalpe dvayaṃ nāstīti tad
YXmavt:739: anenākāreṇa pratyātmavedyatvāt siddham iti pradarśayann āha -
YXmavt:744: etat tritayam apy abhāvān na yujyate /
YXmavt:749: yasmād upalabdhir anupalabdhisvabhāvā tasmāt samatā tulyatā jñeyā /
YXmavt:753: na tu tayā kiñcid upalabhyte'rthābhāvād iti /
YXmavt:756: yaś ca bālānām asatyārthe'rthopalambho yaścāryāṇām arthānupalambhas
YXmavt:757: tayor dvayos tulyalakṣaṇatvāt samatā jñeyā sarpabhrānty anupalabdhivat
YXmavt:758: ata eva bravīti - abhūtārthapratibhāsatayā tūpalabdhir ity
YXmavt:761: yaś ca bālānāṃ grāhakopalambho yaścāryāṇām arthābhāvād
YXmavt:766: tasmāc ca samtā jñeyā nopalambhopalambhayoḥ / iti /
YXmavt:771: kiṃ tarhi samam etad ubhayaṃ nirvikalpatayā /
YXmavt:775: nāpaneyam ataḥ kiñcit prakṣeptavyaṃ na kiñcana /
YXmavt:777: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ vijñaptir upalabdhir ity ucyate /
YXmavt:778: abhūtārthapratibhāsatayā loke śāstre ca tathā pratītatvād
YXmavt:794: yathā rūpaṃ bhūtāni bhautikañca, evamabhūtaparikalpo'pi cittaṃ
YXmavt:816: teṣu sarveṣu vyākhyāneṣu katame ta ityavaśyaṃ pūrvavyākhyānoktā eva
YXmavt:839: cittaviśeṣā eva caitasā ihābhipretā iti kecijjānanti /
YXmavt:843: naikaṃ hi lakṣaṇaṃ loke vicitram iṣyate /
YXmavt:844: mā bhūd ekam anekasvabhāvam iti syād eṣa [p.26]
YXmavt:850: yā vedanā yā saṃjñā yac cittaṃ yad vijñānañca saṃsṛṣṭvā amī
YXmavt:852: saṃsargaś ca nāma satāṃ yugapac ca bhavatīti /
YXmavt:853: yo hi dharmasvabhāvam apariniṣpannam icchati tasyaitat sūtram
YXmavt:871: tat punaḥ saptavidhaṃ pravṛttivijñānam upabhogaprayojakatvād aupabhogikaṃ
YXmavt:873: tatra vijñāne ye caitasās te'pi tat phalam iti sambandhaḥ /
YXmavt:875: ālayavijñānam anyeṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayatvāt pratyayavijñānam iti /
YXmavt:876: ālīyante sarve sāsravā dharmās tatra phalabhāvena tac ca teṣu
YXmavt:880: sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bījam anubadhnāti anyeṣāñca
YXmavt:883: tasmād ālayavijñānāt pratyetīti tat pratyayam utpadyata ityarthaḥ /
YXmavt:885: pravṛttivijñānaṃ hy ālayavijñānāt pravartamānam anutpannasya taj
YXmavt:888: tasmāt paripuṣṭabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptāt punas taj jātīyaṃ
YXmavt:889: pravṛttivijñānam utpadyata ityevaṃ tat pratyayaṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ
YXmavt:896: sarvadharmā hi ālīnā vijñāne teṣu tat tathā /
YXmavt:911: triprakārāpy upabhukṣyata ity upabhogaḥ anubhūyata ity arthaḥ /
YXmavt:913: tasmā bālās tat saṃvedanārthaṃ viṣayam abhiniviśante /
YXmavt:914: na kevalaṃ vedanā arthopalabdhir apy upabhoga ityanye /
YXmavt:915: tac ca na upabhogo vedaneti bhāṣyavirodhāt /
YXmavt:916: arthopalabdhiś ca na vijñānād anyeti na tasyāścaitasatvaṃ prayujyate /
YXmavt:918: upabhoge saṃjñāyāñ ca prerakāḥ saṃskārā vijñānasya
YXmavt:924: viṣayacihnaṃ vyavahāranimittaṃ paricchinnaṃ karotīti paricchedaḥ saṃjñā
YXmavt:928: uktaṃ yato yādṛśo yad arthā ca pravṛttir iti //1-10//
YXmavt:940: duḥKhanā jantyā jarāmaraṇena ca parikliśyate jagat /
YXmavt:942: pravartamānā jagataḥ parikleśāya bhavanti tat saṅkleśalakṣaṇaṃ /
YXmavt:950: kena chādanāt kathaṃ vā chādanāt kliśyata iti ?
YXmavt:956: bhūtadarśanaṃ punaḥ prādhānyena lokottaraprajñā tat pṛṣṭhodbhavatvāt
YXmavt:957: tat pṛṣṭhalābhāt tad avagamāc ca tat prayoga iti
YXmavt:959: bhūtadarśanavibandhād avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyaya ityevaṃ chādanād
YXmavt:962: kena ropaṇāt kva kasya vetyata āha saṃskārair vijñāne karmavāsanāyā iti /
YXmavt:963: tatra saṃskārā yat kāyikaṃ karma vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca
YXmavt:964: puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyasvarūpaṃ tat punar bhavam abhisaṃskarotīti saṃskāraḥ /
YXmavt:966: tadeva ca saṃskāraśabdenocyate na tu sarvaṃ /
YXmavt:967: taccābidyādhipatyāt punar bhavam ākṣeptuṃ samarthaṃ bhavati na
YXmavt:969: tathāhi tāny anutpannavidyasya punarbhavaṃ saṃskurvanti notpannavidyasya /
YXmavt:970: na cādhipatyamātreṇaivāvidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyaya ucyate sāmānyena
YXmavt:977: sahabhūtā'vidyā sāmānyapratyaya iti saṃskārāṇāṃ pratyaya uktaḥ /
YXmavt:978: vijñāna iti atrālayavijñānam abhipretaṃ na tu pravṛttivijñānaṃ /
YXmavt:988: pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ punaratra vijñānasantāne tat prathamatas tad bījasyāpy
YXmavt:990: nahi kasyacit sāsravasya dharmasyānāsravasyevāpūrvaṃ bījam ādhīyate
YXmavt:991: evaṃ saṃskārair vijñāne punarbhāvabījādhānāj jagat kliśyate /
YXmavt:993: kena nayanāt kva kasya veti na vijñāyata ityāha vijñānenotpatti
YXmavt:996: upapattisthāne punar bhavabījabhūtāyā vāsanāyāḥ prāpaṇaṃ nayanaṃ /
YXmavt:997: tathā ca sati na pratisandhivijñānaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ
YXmavt:1001: ārūpyasamāpatīlābhino hi yatraiva cyavante tatraivotpadyanta iti katham
YXmavt:1010: tad bhāvitaviśeṣeṇa hy anatareṣu nikāyasabhāgeṣu tad viśiṣṭatvaṃ sidhyati
YXmavt:1013: atha vā''maraṇāt sarvam evātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti tat prathamataḥ
YXmavt:1015: atha vā'bhinne'pi nāmarūpeṇāti tat prathamataḥ sarvasya hetubhāvena
YXmavt:1017: atha vā'bhinne'pi nāmarūpeṇātmabhāvo yathā parigṛhyeta tat pṛthaktvena
YXmavt:1018: darśayati yathā sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṅgṛhītam iti /
YXmavt:1025: nāmarūpāvasthāyāṃ hi śarīram aparipūrṇam ucyate cakṣurādy
YXmavt:1027: asti ca tasyām avasthāyāṃ kāyāyatanaṃ manāayatanañca tad apy
YXmavt:1031: kāyāyatanaṃ ca paripūrṇaṃ bhavati taccakṣūr ādyāśritānāṃ
YXmavt:1038: āśrayaparipūraṇāt ṣaḍāyatanena kliśyate jagad iti veditavyaṃ /
YXmavt:1041: sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yastriprakāro vikāras tat paricchedaḥ sparśaḥ
YXmavt:1042: ata evāyam indriyavikārasādṛśyaṃ spṛśati tadākāratayeti sparśa ucyate / [p.31]
YXmavt:1043: atha vā ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa indriyasya sukhādivedanānukūlaṃ
YXmavt:1046: vedanā hi tṛṣṇayopabhujyate āsvādyata ity arthaḥ /
YXmavt:1052: karṣaṇāt kena kasya veti na vijñāyata ity ata āha tṛṣṇayā
YXmavt:1056: yadārdrīkṛtaḥ puar bhava utpattāv upayuṅkte utpattiṃ cāvasthāpayati
YXmavt:1059: kena nibandhanāt kva kasya veti praśnāvakāśe svayam evāha upādānair
YXmavt:1063: ca vijñānaṃ hi cchandarāgavaśāt tatra vartate /
YXmavt:1064: ābhimukhyādity atrāpi parapraśnāvakāśe svayamevaha bhavena kṛtasya
YXmavt:1067: vāsanāvasthaṃ vipākaphalaṃ prati vṛttilambhanād bhavaḥ sadbhūta
YXmavt:1073: evaṃ bhavāt punarbhavābhinirvṛttau satyāmādita eva garbhādhāne
YXmavt:1076: tathā ca mātubhojanacaryayoḥ saṅkaṭaghunoraparityāgād api kliśyate /
YXmavt:1078: kliśyate jagaj jātaṃ punar jarayā khālityapālityādilakṣaṇayā maraṇena
YXmavt:1086: kliśyata iti na vyavadāyata ity apare /
YXmavt:1098: upanayahetuḥ parigrahahetuḥ upabhogahetuḥ ākarṣaṇahetuḥ udvegahetuś ca ...
YXmavt:1107: katividhaḥ punar anena dvādaśāṅgena na pratītyasamutpādena samāsataḥ
YXmavt:1108: saṃkleśaḥ pradarśita ityata evedam ucyate so'yaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ
YXmavt:1110: tredhā dvedhā ca saṃkleśaḥ saptadhā iti /
YXmavt:1114: kleśo hi pravartamānaḥ svaparātmanor vyābādhakatvāt saṃkleśaḥ /
YXmavt:1115: yathoktaṃ sūtre'pi - rakto rāgaparīta ātmavyābādhāyāpi cetayate
YXmavt:1120: tathā hi kleśādhipatyena karma janmākṣipati dṛṣṭasatyasya satyapi karmaṇi
YXmavt:1125: karma ca śubhāśubhaṃ tadātve kāyacittayor āyāsanimittatvād
YXmavt:1134: svarūpāvasthaṃ karma saṃskārāḥ bījāvasthaṃ bhava iti /
YXmavt:1144: punaḥ sa eva pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptadhā saṃkleśa iti
YXmavt:1148: avidyāgato hi tattvasammohād anityādīn nityādirūpeṇa viparyasyatīti /
YXmavt:1154: pūrvaṃ nāmarūpeṇaiva parigraha ukto jarāyujādikāṃ yonim abhipretya
YXmavt:1155: idānīm upapādukam adhikṛtya ṣaḍāyatanenā'pi parigraha uktaḥ /
YXmavt:1156: atha vā nāmarūpeṇa tat prathamata ātmabhāvamātrasya saṅgraho
YXmavt:1158: iha tv aparipūrṇasya paripūrṇasya ceti nāsti virodhaḥ /
YXmavt:1162: sa upabhuktakarmavipāko bālas tasyāṃ tasyāṃ vedanāyāṃ tṛṣyati /
YXmavt:1163: vivṛddhatṛṣṇaś ca tat saṃyogatṛṣṇayā kāmādīn upādatte /
YXmavt:1164: tad upādānāc cāsya pūrvabhūtaṃ paunarbhavikaṃ karma vāsanāvasthaṃ
YXmavt:1165: pariṇataṃ yathākṣiptavipākadānayā pravṛttiṃ labdhvā bhavo bhavati /
YXmavt:1166: sa ca tṛṣṇopādānabhavaḥ saṃskārākṣiptaḥ punar bhavābhinirvṛttaya
YXmavt:1176: karmatvasādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ aṅkurasyeva bījaṃ tad bhedena janambhedād iti
YXmavt:1177: atha vā nātra pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāntāni trīṇi kāṇḍāni kiṃ tarhi
YXmavt:1184: tasmānnātra hetuḥ phalaṃ vā sarvatra pañcaskandhikāvastheti
YXmavt:1191: yathābhinirvṛttir yā cābhinirvṛttiḥ tasyāñca ya ādīnava iti /
YXmavt:1193: avidyāpratyayaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ yathā tattvaṃ mugdhvā viparītaṃ saṃjānāti
YXmavt:1198: paunarbhavikaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca yathāyogaṃ /
YXmavt:1203: tasya vijñāne vāsanāvasthasya karmaṇas tena bhavīkaraṇāt /
YXmavt:1206: upādānaviśeṣaparigraheṇa yenātra punar bhavatvaṃ vartate so'tra bhava
YXmavt:1212: atra tūpanayahetur nirarthaṃ iti cet na nirarthakaḥ /
YXmavt:1214: sarve caite saṅkleśā abhūtaparikalpāt pravartanta iti
YXmavt:1220: piṇḍārthaḥ punar abhūtaparikalpasya navavidhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ paridīpitaṃ
YXmavt:1236: kalpitaḥ paratantraś ca pariniṣpanna eva ca / iti /
YXmavt:1243: tarthārthadṛṣṭir vijñānaṃ tad viśeṣe tu caitasāḥ / iti /
YXmavt:1249: evam abhūtaparikalpaṃ navaprakāraṃ khyāpayitvā yathā śūnyatā
YXmavt:1251: dvayam anena pratijñātam abhūtaparikalpaḥ śūnyatā ca / [p.36]
YXmavt:1266: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yadebhiḥ prakāraiḥ śūnyatā vijñātavyā ?
YXmavt:1271: saṃkleśe nirākṛte sā viśuddheti tat saṃkleśaprahāṇāya
YXmavt:1273: bheda sādhanāvabodhād vikārābhāve saty api bhedaṃ sukhaṃ pratipadyata
YXmavt:1275: pṛthaktve sati dharmād anyā dharmateti na yujyate anityatāduḥkhatāvat /
YXmavt:1276: ekatve sati viśuddhyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na syāt sāmānyalakṣaṇañca /
YXmavt:1278: kathaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vijñeyam iti lakṣaṇaṃ hi prāg uddiṣṭam ityatas tadeva
YXmavt:1280: dvayā'bhāvo hy abhāvasya bhāvaḥ śūnyasya lakṣaṇaṃ / [p.37]
YXmavt:1284: tasya ca dvayābhāvasya yo bhāva etac chūnyatāyā lakṣaṇaṃ /
YXmavt:1291: ity abhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇatvaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavati na
YXmavt:1296: svātantryam evātra gamyate śaśaviṣāṇābhāvavat na duḥkhatādivad
YXmavt:1301: atha vā dvayābhāvaḥ śūnyatety abhāvaśabdasya sāmānyavācitān na
YXmavt:1304: na hi prāg abhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvau svopadānād anyatrākhyātuṃ yujyete
YXmavt:1308: yady abhāvātmikā śūnyatā kathaṃ paramārtha ucyate ?
YXmavt:1320: so'bhāvaśced dvayasyāstitvaṃ syān na ca syād abhūtaparikalpasya
YXmavt:1323: nityasukhabhāvābhāvasvarūpatvān na bhāvo nāpy abhāva ity ucyate /
YXmavt:1324: yadi punar abhūtaparikalpasya śūnyatā dharmatāsti kim asau tasmād anyo
YXmavt:1331: pṛthaktve sati dharmād anyā dharmateti na yujyate /
YXmavt:1333: dharmād vibhinnalakṣaṇatvād dharmatā dharmāntaram eva bhavati tad
YXmavt:1335: na ca dharmāntaraṃ dharmāntarasya dharmatā bhavitum arhati tatra punar
YXmavt:1338: yathā'nityatā'nityebhyo nānyā duḥkhatā ca duḥkhād eva śūnyatā'pi na
YXmavt:1340: ekatve sati viśuddhyālambanaṃ na syāt sāmānyalakṣaṇañceti /
YXmavt:1345: tasyāpi dharmasvarūpavat parasparato bheda iti sāmānyatā hīyate /
YXmavt:1346: atha vā svalakṣaṇasya tasmād anyatvād bhāvasvarūpavad bhedābhāvaḥ /
YXmavt:1349: atha vā viśuddhyartham ālambanaṃ viśuddhyālambanaṃ na bhāvasvalakṣaṇam
YXmavt:1352: yo hi bhāvasya satastattvānyatvena vyākaroti tena nirgranthavād
YXmavt:1354: śūnyatā tu na bhāva iti nāstyayaṃ doṣaḥ /
YXmavt:1360: dharmadhātuś ca paryāyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ samāsataḥ // iti /
YXmavt:1364: etac ca paryāyapañcakaṃ yathāpradhānaṃ gāthāyām uktam evam anye'pi
YXmavt:1366: tad yathā - advayatā avikalpadhātuḥ dharmatā anabhilapyatā anirodhaḥ
YXmavt:1369: naite śabdā gauṇāḥ kiṃ tarhi anvarthā iti -
YXmavt:1373: tadeva pradarśanārtham āha nityaṃ tathaiveti kṛtvā /
YXmavt:1377: koṭiḥ paryanto yataḥ pareṇānyajjñeyaṃ nāstītyato bhūtakoṭir
YXmavt:1389: sarvair eva saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtanimittaiḥ śūnyatā śūnyety animittam ucyate /
YXmavt:1392: āryajñānagocaratvāt paramārtha iti paramaṃ hi lokottarajñānaṃ /
YXmavt:1394: etad eva pradarśayann āha - paramajñānagocaratvād iti /
YXmavt:1399: tadeva vibhāvayann āha - āryadharmāṇāṃ tad ālambanaprabhatvād iti /
YXmavt:1400: svalakṣaṇopādāyarūpadhāraṇe'py ayaṃ dhātuśabdo vartata ity āha
YXmavt:1404: sūtrāntareṣv anye paryāyā uktā apyanenaiva nyāyena svārthe
YXmavt:1407: athavā paryāyārthānantaraṃ bhedo vijñeya ity uktam atas
YXmavt:1408: tannirdeśānantaraṃ pṛcchati - kathaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ prabhedo vijñeya iti /
YXmavt:1409: abhūtaparikalpo hi saṃkleśaḥ tasya prahāṇaṃ viśuddhir ucyate /
YXmavt:1410: saṅkleśaviśuddhikāle ca śūnyatāvyatiriktam anyan nāsti yat saṅkliśyate
YXmavt:1412: tasmāt saṃkleśaviśuddhikālayoḥ śūnyataiva saṅkliśyate viśuddhyate ceti
YXmavt:1416: kadā saṅkliṣṭā kadā nirmaletyanavabodhāt pṛcchati - kasyām
YXmavt:1426: yeṣām āryāṇāṃ tattvajñānād aviparītacetasāṃ śūnyatā nirantaram
YXmavt:1427: ākāśavad virajaskā prakhyāti tān prati prahīṇamaletyucyate /
YXmavt:1428: evaṃ śūnyatāyā āpekṣikā saṃkleśaviśuddhir draṣṭavyā na
YXmavt:1431: na hy avasthābhedo vikāram antareṇa dṛṣṭaḥ /
YXmavt:1433: ata āha - kathaṃ vikāradharmiṇītvādanityā na bhavatīti /
YXmavt:1434: na hi saṅkliṣṭāvasthātaḥ śūnyatāviśuddhā'vasthāyām anyo vikāraḥ /
YXmavt:1443: evaṃ śūnyatāpy āgantukamalaiḥ saṅkliśyate, avikṛtasvarūpāpi tad
YXmavt:1445: yo hi tameva bhāvaṃ pūrvaṃ saṅkleśalakṣaṇaṃ paścād viśuddhisvabhāvaṃ
YXmavt:1447: vikārasvabhāvatvāt na tu yatrāpy āgantukaṃ tad ubhayaṃ /
YXmavt:1449: prabhedanirdeśādhikāre sarve śūnyatāprabhedā vaktavyā ityata āha
YXmavt:1459: nānyathā tan nānātvaṃ śakyate darśayitum ityato vastunānātvena tan
YXmavt:1461: pūrvaṃ tāvad bhoktā vibhāvayitavyaḥ tat snehābhiniveśatyājanārthaṃ /
YXmavt:1465: tad anantaraṃ tad adhiṣṭhānasya śarīrasya pratiṣṭhābhājanaloko
YXmavt:1468: etac catur vidhaṃ vastu tac chūnyatā vastuśūnyatety ucyate /
YXmavt:1470: tāni ca cakṣūrādīni yāvan manaḥ paryantāni /
YXmavt:1475: tāni viṣayābhāvena bhujyanta iti bhojanam ato bāhyāyatanaśūnyatā
YXmavt:1481: ata evāha - tasya vistīrṇatvāt tacchūnyatā mahāśūnyatocyate iti /
YXmavt:1486: dṛṣṭaṃ tatra yo grāhyagrāhakābhiniśeśo'yam eva cātra paramārthākāro
YXmavt:1487: yathā tac chrutājñānena dṛṣṭam iti vikalpaḥ /
