YXmavt:2152: alpaśruto he na śaknoti dharmān pravivektum /
YXmavt:2163: yatrā'rthe daśa kāraṇāni bhavantīti - utpattyādau prāptiparyante
YXmavt:2170: ucyate tadyathā kuḍyādikam ālokamāvṛnvat kāryasya cakṣur
YXmavt:2172: evaṃ kṛtvaiṣāṃ daśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ triṃśad āvaraṇaviparyayeṇa triṃśat
YXmavt:2174: tatra śubhotpattikāraṇaṃ trīṇi - prayoga āyatanaprayogo yoniśaḥ prayogaś
YXmavt:2176: tad yathā cakṣur ādaya ityatraiva dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
YXmavt:2180: evam utpattyāvaraṇaṃ śubhe draṣṭavyam ityāha tasyotpādanīyatvād iti
YXmavt:2181: śubhe sthityādyasambhavād utpattyāvaraṇam evaitad iti darśayati /
YXmavt:2185: yāval lokas tāvad avasthānād akopyatvaṃ, nā'nyathā bhavati vinivartate
YXmavt:2187: śrāvakādīnān tu bodhiḥ svasantāna eva kṛtārthatvād vyāvartate /
YXmavt:2189: āśrayaparāvṛttilakṣaṇatvād bodher yāvat sattvās tāvad avatiṣṭhantīty
YXmavt:2191: utpattiṃ vinā bhāvitatvāt tu sthiter utpattir apyatra bhavati /
YXmavt:2193: na cā'nyat tad vyatirekeṇa sthitikāraṇam astītyata etad evoktaṃ /
YXmavt:2198: sthitikāraṇāni punar bodheḥ kuśalotpādo manasikāraḥ paripūrṇasambhāraś
YXmavt:2200: atra ca śubhānutpattyādayaḥ kuśalotpatyādivibandhe vartamānā bodheḥ
YXmavt:2202: tadyathā catvāra āhārāḥ sattvānām ityatraiva nidarśanaṃ /
YXmavt:2203: na hi kavaḍākārādibhir āhārair apūrvāḥ sattvā utpadyante
YXmavt:2207: atraiva nidarśanaṃ yadyasyādhārabhūtan tatra tasya dhṛtiḥ
YXmavt:2210: tat kāraṇaṃ gotraṃ kalyāṇamitrasampannatā cittā'parikhedatā ca /
YXmavt:2218: ata evāha - abhivyaktyāvaraṇaṃ dhīmattve tasya prakāśanīyatvād iti /
YXmavt:2234: tasya trīṇi kāraṇāni - sahajadauṣṭhulyopaghāto vīryam apramādaś ca /
YXmavt:2247: tac ca pudgalasambhāvanā dharmā'dhimuktir ābhiprāyikārthā'dhigamaś ca
YXmavt:2248: ebhir dharmaiḥ sampratyayo bhavatītyataś ca sampratyayakāraṇavibandhena
YXmavt:2250: atraiva kāraṇam āha - asampratyayena trasanād iti /
YXmavt:2253: tat punaḥ saddharme gauravaṃ lābhasatkārapūjādinirapekṣatāa sattveṣu ca
YXmavt:2259: dharmamātsaryeṇa ca pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ na deśayati /
YXmavt:2263: tadviruddhatvāc cu tavyasanādikaṃ vaśitva āvaraṇaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
YXmavt:2264: atraiva kāraṇam āha - tasya vaśitvasya vibhutvaprāptilakṣaṇatvād iti /
YXmavt:2265: kecit tu śubhādīnām evam anukrame kāraṇam āhuḥ /
YXmavt:2269: bodhicittañcāgamyaitad ubhayasampādane samartho bhavati ā bodher
YXmavt:2276: evañca prayujyamāno viparyāsaṃ prajahāti aviparyastaṃ ca jñānam
YXmavt:2278: ato dhīmatvānantaram abhrāntir uktā sa punar darśanamārgaḥ /
YXmavt:2279: tad abhyasanenāvaraṇaṃ vijahātītyatas tad anantaram āvaraṇaprahāṇam
YXmavt:2281: nirāvaraṇasya bhavabhogasaktyabhavād buddhatva eva mānasaṃ pariṇāmayati
YXmavt:2284: evam bhūtasya ca sugambhīreṣv api buddhadharmeṣu prāmodyotpatīratrāsa
YXmavt:2286: evaṃ dharmapratyakṣeṇa yena yenopāyena sattvavinayaṃ paśyati
YXmavt:2287: tantamevopāyambhajata iti tasya kuto mātsaryambhaved ityatrāsānantaram
YXmavt:2290: pravartata ityatas tad anantaraṃ vaśitvam uktaṃ /
YXmavt:2292: asmin paricchede āvaraṇaprasaṅga ityataḥ śubhādīnām utpatīkāraṇāny
YXmavt:2311: pūrvañca śubhādihetvāvaraṇadvāreṇa phalāvaraṇam uktaṃ iha tu sākṣāt
YXmavt:2313: atha vā'prayogādibhyo vastvakauśalādikam anyadeveti tad anyad ucyate /
YXmavt:2315: aprayogādikam āvaraṇam uktaṃ iha tu śubhasyaiva
YXmavt:2319: mārgaparyantā bodhipakṣā ity ucyate daśa pāramitā daśa ca bhūmayo
YXmavt:2324: teṣām punar vastu kāyavedanācittadharmāḥ tad viṣayatvāt /
YXmavt:2336: śucisukhanityātmākāreṇa vā vikalpo vastv akauśalam yasmād ajñānaṃ
YXmavt:2339: evāvaraṇam ucyate na tu vastvasmaraṇam apīti ?
YXmavt:2341: tathā hi darśanātmakatvāt prajñāyāḥ prajñāpṛṣṭhalabdha ālambane
YXmavt:2342: smṛtyādayaḥ pravartante na tu svātantryeṇa prajñāvat /
YXmavt:2350: tat punar bhedābhāve'pi phalabhedāc caturdhā vyavasthāpyata iti smṛtiḥ
YXmavt:2351: ataḥ samyak prahāṇānāṃ vīryātmakatvād ālasyam āvaraṇam uktaṃ /
YXmavt:2356: gamanaṃ vā ṛddhiḥ ākāśagamanādikā samṛddhir ityarthaḥ /
YXmavt:2360: na tu vīryādayas tatra na santi chandasahāyatvād apradhānās tu te
YXmavt:2364: na taj jñāyate ata āha - aparipūryā ca cchandavīryacittamīmāṃsānām
YXmavt:2367: anyatamavaikalyāt tadādhipatyasya samādher abhāvād bhāvanā hīyata
YXmavt:2370: eṣāṃ hi prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ bhāvanayā samādhau vaśitvam avāpyate
YXmavt:2371: nānyathetyata eṣāṃ vaikalyād bhāvanāhīnateti na samādhau vaśitvam
YXmavt:2378: kuśalamūlam abhisaṃskaroti tena mokṣalābhaniścayāt mokṣabhāgīyam ucyate
YXmavt:2386: katham punar indriyāṇān daurbalyam ityata āha - vipakṣavyavakiraṇād iti
YXmavt:2390: etac ca dvividham api nirvedhabhāgīyān durbalam
YXmavt:2395: tasmād yat teṣām eva śraddhādīnām uṣmagatamūrdhānāvasthāyāṃ
YXmavt:2407: yadi tu bodheranukūlatvād aṅgāni syur evaṃ smṛtyupasthānādīnām api
YXmavt:2409: katham idaṃ bodhyaṅgeṣu dṛṣṭidoṣa āvaraṇam ityata āha - teṣān
YXmavt:2413: parikalpitāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā'vidayā tadālambanāṣca rāgādayaḥ
YXmavt:2417: iha tu pradhānavivakṣayā dṛṣṭidoṣopadeśa iti na teṣām anupadeśo
YXmavt:2430: saṅkṣepatas tu darśanaprahātavyād anyā sāsravā tacchaktir
YXmavt:2436: tad anantaramparāramitāsu vaktavyam ityata āha - pāramitāsvāvaraṇaṃ
YXmavt:2439: atra daśānāṃ pāramitānāṃ yasyāḥ pāramitāyā yat phalaṃ tadāvaraṇena
YXmavt:2441: kimatra kāraṇaṃ yan mātsaryādayo vastuto dānādivibandhe vartamānas tat
YXmavt:2444: tasmān mātsaryādiprahāṇa ādarotpādanārthaṃ phalāvaraṇam uktaṃ na
YXmavt:2467: śobhanā gatiḥ sugatiḥ manuṣyo devaś ca /
YXmavt:2472: etac ca kṣānti phalaṃ tadāvaraṇaṃ krodhaḥ /
YXmavt:2488: taccā'nuśāsanyā bhavati anuśāsanī ca prajñā nā'nyathetyataḥ
YXmavt:2492: dānaśīlādīnām akṣayatve yadāvaraṇam tad upāyapāramitāyā āvaraṇaṃ
YXmavt:2493: tat punar dānādyakṣayatvaṃ kathambhavatītyata āha - bodhipariṇāmanayā
YXmavt:2495: mahābodhipariṇataṃ dānādi kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate buddhatvam iva /
YXmavt:2501: katham ityata āha - praṇidhānavaśena tad anukūlopapattiparigrahād iti /
YXmavt:2522: atra ca dravyataḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ nāmato daśa /
YXmavt:2528: jñānapāramitā prakṛṣṭā satī kathaṃ na nirvikalpa iti ?
YXmavt:2530: taj jñānāvabuddhatvaṃ paricchidya svayaṃ ca dharmasambhogaṃ
YXmavt:2532: tac caitan nirvikalpe dvayam api nāstītyato na nirvikalpā
YXmavt:2536: tad anantaraṃ bhūmiṣu vaktavyam ityata āha - bhūmau punar yathākramaṃ
YXmavt:2545: dharmadhātoḥ sarvatragādyarthe yena yena vihāreṇa bodhisattvo bahulaṃ
YXmavt:2546: viharati tasmin tasmin vihāre'vasthānārthena bhūmyākhyet pare /
YXmavt:2549: abhisamita dharmo vimalāyāṃ svarasavāhinam adhiśīlaṃ śikṣāviśeṣaṃ
YXmavt:2555: tāsām eva śikṣāṇāṃ śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu caturvidhaṃ phalaṃ veditavyaṃ /
YXmavt:2565: tatra yad akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ tad daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu [p.76]
YXmavt:2566: daśavidham āvaraṇaṃ yathākramaṃ tad vipakṣatvād iti bhūmivipakṣatvāt /
YXmavt:2570: tathā hi pramuditāyāḥ sarva eva darśanamārgapraheyā āvaraṇaṃ /
YXmavt:2574: te tv aprahīṇā api prahīṇavat bodhisattvānāṃ na saṃkleśakarā
YXmavt:2579: daśasu ca bhūmiṣu daśa pāramitā yathākramam atiriktatarā bhavantīti
YXmavt:2580: vacanāt tad vipakṣasyāpi mātsaryādikasya yathākramaṃ prahāṇam iti
YXmavt:2582: yadyanyo'pi kleśa āvaraṇaṃ syāt kasmād uktaṃ bhūmiṣv akliṣṭam
YXmavt:2585: etaddhi bodhisattvānām eva nirvāṇādhigamavibandhair vartate na
YXmavt:2587: tathā hi - śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhāś ca tasmin satyeva mucyante na tu
YXmavt:2589: etad bhūmiṣv āvaraṇam uktaṃ na tvetad eva bhūmiṣvāvaraṇam iti kṛtvā /
YXmavt:2590: kleśas tu śrāvakādibhir bodhisattvānāṃ samāna iti tasyāvaraṇatvena
YXmavt:2591: bodhisattvabhūmiṣu na vidhir na pratiṣedha iti tasyā'vacane'pyāvaraṇaṃ na
YXmavt:2593: anya āha - akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ śrāvakādibhir bodhisattvānāṃ samānam iti
YXmavt:2596: kleśo'pi śrāvakādibhir bodhisattvānāṃ samāna evetyasāvānuṣaṅgiko na
YXmavt:2598: anye tvāhuḥ - yad bhūmīnām ajñānam āvaraṇaṃ tacchrāvakādīnām
YXmavt:2601: bodhisattvānān tu kliṣṭaṃ nirvāṇādhigame vibandhahetubhāvād iti /
YXmavt:2604: prathamayā hi bhūmyā dharmadhātoḥ sarvatragārthaṃ pratividhyatīti /
YXmavt:2613: yo'haṃ sa paro yo vā paraḥ so'ham iti paratrātmani ca śūnyatāyā
YXmavt:2616: tato'tra bodhisattvo yathā svārthe tathā parārthe pravartate /
YXmavt:2618: etac ca tritayam itarāsv api bhūmiṣu vijñeyaṃ /
YXmavt:2623: sarvākārapariśodhanābhinirhāra eva yogaḥ karaṇīya ityāgamaṃ darśayati
YXmavt:2624: sūtre hy uktaṃ - yasmāditi daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prajñākāreṇa
YXmavt:2626: tata uttaraṃ pariśodhitā yāvad pratyeka buddhyānaṃ saṃvartayanti/
YXmavt:2630: tata uttaraṃ pariśuddhitaratvād yāvad daśabalabalatvāya saṃvartante /
YXmavt:2632: yasmād etad asyaiva bhavati dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau tasmāt tarhītyādi /
YXmavt:2651: trisāhasramahāsāhasrapramāṇāyām apy agnikaṇḍāyām ātmānaṃ prakṣiped iti /
YXmavt:2652: uktaṃ hi sūtre - sa ced idaṃ kaścidevaṃ brūyāt - evam ahaṃ tubhyam idaṃ
YXmavt:2654: saṃśrāvayeyaṃ sa cet tvaṃ mahatyām agnikhaḍāyāṃ samprajvalitāyām
YXmavt:2662: api tu khalu punaḥ sarvair nirayāpāyaduḥkhasaṃvāsair apy asmābhis
YXmavt:2663: sarvabuddhadharmāḥ paryeṣitavyāḥ kiṃ punar manuṣyaduḥkhasaṃvāsair iti /
YXmavt:2667: caturthyam bhūmau samatvād anātmīyatvaṃ dharmadhātoḥ pratividhyati
YXmavt:2674: bodhisattvasya yā'pi sūtrādidharmatṛṣṇā pūrvam āsīt sā'pi
YXmavt:2705: pratītyasamutpāde nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yaḥ saṅkliśyate vā viśuddhyate
YXmavt:2708: tatra na kasyacid dharmasya saṅkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ vā pratividhyati
YXmavt:2710: saṅkleśamātratvāt na ca tad vyatirikto'nya ātmā'styātmīyo vā yasmin
YXmavt:2723: tāni balān nānātvena tat praveśatat pṛṣṭalabdhayor abhimukhībhavanti
YXmavt:2726: nimitttābhāvatvaṃ pratividhyatīti tāni tāni nimittāni na
YXmavt:2728: tasmāt tasyāṃ bhūmāv upāyaparamitā'tiriktatarā bhavati yataḥ
YXmavt:2729: sarvanimittāny animittatvena pratividhyati nimittakṛtaṃ ca vyavahāraṃ na
YXmavt:2731: tat prativedhāc ca tasyām eva vaśitvaṃ pratilabhate /
YXmavt:2736: ata evā'sau nityaṃ tathaiveti kṛtvā tathatetyucyate /
YXmavt:2739: tathā hi nimittam evā'nimittam iti kiñcid
YXmavt:2759: kathame tad vijñayate navamyā jñanavaṣitāśrayatvaṃ pratividhyatīti ?
YXmavt:2763: ato'tra jñānavaśitāśrayatvaṃ dharmadhātoḥ pratividdham iti vijñāyate /
YXmavt:2768: ata āha - yathecchaṃ nirmāṇaiḥ sattvārthakaraṇād iti /
YXmavt:2772: nirmāṇakāyair yatheṣṭaṃ yasya yathā yasmin kāle yat kartavyaṃ tasya
YXmavt:2778: akliṣṭam ajñānam ekaikāyām api bhūmyām āvaraṇaṃ tat pratipakṣā
YXmavt:2779: bodhisattvānāṃ daśa bhūmayo vyavasthitāḥ navamyā daśamyāśca bhūmeḥ
YXmavt:2780: phalena viśeṣaḥ paridīpito nāvaraṇabheda prativedhaviśeṣeṇa tad vihārasya
YXmavt:2784: tasmād etad evoktaṃ - bhūmyāvaraṇaṃ pāramitāviśeṣagatyāvaraṇam iti /
YXmavt:2789: prāg uktāni bahuvidhāni sarvāvaraṇāni dvayāvaraṇāntar gatānīti
YXmavt:2793: samāsato dvayam eva na punas tṛtīyam apy astīti /
YXmavt:2797: sarvāvaraṇāni dvayāvaraṇāntargatāni nānyat tṛtīyam astīti gamyate /
YXmavt:2802: na hy abhidhānād antarbhāvaḥ kin tarhi svabhāvāt /
YXmavt:2803: api ca vyāpyāvaraṇavacanāt tad apy uktam eva /
YXmavt:2808: ataḥ śeṣāvaraṇavat tad apy āvaraṇam iti pratipāditam bhavati /
YXmavt:2809: saukṣmyaprakarṣāvasthaṃ tv akliṣṭam ajñānam kleśavāsanāś ca
YXmavt:2811: tasmāt saukṣmyaprakarṣād anyathā prekṣituṃ na śakyata ityevam ākhyānam
YXmavt:2816: prayogāvaraṇaṃ yad udriktam iti teṣām eva rāgādicaritānāṃ taiḥ
YXmavt:2818: prāptyāvaraṇaṃ yat samam iti samabhāgacaritānāṃ taddhi prāptivibandhe
YXmavt:2824: samyak prayogāvaraṇaṃ yan navadhā kleśalakṣaṇam iti nava
YXmavt:2826: tāni samyak prayogasyāvaraṇaṃ bhavanti yathā tathoktaṃ /
YXmavt:2831: śubhānuttaryāvaraṇaṃ yat pāramitāsu tata uttari śubhābhāvāt /
YXmavt:2832: tad viśeṣagatyāvaraṇaṃ yad bhūmiṣv iti pāramitā eva hi
YXmavt:2834: saṅgrahāvaraṇaṃ yat samāsato dvividham iti kleśāvaraṇaṃ
YXmavt:2837: piṇḍīkṛtaṃ hi sukham udgṛhyate dhāryate ceti //
YXmavt:2844: /atas- tadbheda-anavabodhe tattva-sva-rūpaṃ dur-avagamam ity/- atas- tattva-prabhedam
YXmavt:2879: atra tattvā nukūlyāt saṃvṛtir api tattvam ityuktam ityeke /
YXmavt:2881: yadyenaprakāreṇa na visamvadati tat tathā tattvam iti kṛtvā //3-2//
YXmavt:2885: ityetad aprasiddham ityata āha - parikalpitaḥ paratantraḥ pariniṣpannaś
YXmavt:2888: kāraṇena svabhāvas trividho mūlatattvam ity ucyate tat pradarśayann āha
YXmavt:2902: viśuddhānāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ caturdhā grahaṇam mataṃ // iti /
YXmavt:2905: kim atra svabhāvatraye tattvam iṣyata iti /
YXmavt:2907: kimatra svabhāvatraye'viparītatvam iti yasmāt svabhāvatraye tattvam
YXmavt:2911: parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ nityam asad iti yatra hi bālānāṃ
YXmavt:2914: tasmād asadātmakatvād abhrāntitvāc ca parikalpitalakṣaṇam asattvaṃ /
YXmavt:2916: aviparītatvād iti aviparītārtho'tra tattvārthaṃ iti darśayati /
YXmavt:2917: paratantralakṣaṇam sacca na ca tattvata iti /
YXmavt:2920: etad eva pratipādayann āha bhrāntimātratvād iti /
YXmavt:2921: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yat khyāti māyopādānavat tad asti /
YXmavt:2922: yathā khyāti grāhyagrāhakākāreṇa naitad eva māyāpuruṣādivat /
YXmavt:2924: ityetat paratantrasvabhāve tattvaṃ anyathā vidyamānasya svātmany
YXmavt:2935: svabhāvatrayasya tattvam uktaṃ na tu lakṣaṇam ityataḥ pṛcchati /
YXmavt:2936: athavā mūlatattvā'nantaraṃ lakṣaṇatattvam uktaṃ taccā'prasiddham iti
YXmavt:2941: pudgaladharmayoḥ samāropā'pavādadarśanaṃ yasya jñānān na pravartate
YXmavt:2949: pudgaladharmayoḥ samāropā'pavādadarśanaṃ yasya lakṣaṇasya paricchedān na
YXmavt:2952: tac ca vyavahāreṇa tattvaṃ na tu svabhāvena yasmāt
YXmavt:2957: grāhyagrāhakapratibhāsabhrāntiryā dharmeṇa pudgalena ca gṛhyate sā
YXmavt:2961: yasya lakṣaṇasya jñānād grāhyagrāhakayoḥ samāropā'pavādadarśanaṃ na
YXmavt:2969: kecidāhuḥ yadi śūnyatāṃ bhāva eveti samanupaśYati evaṃ
YXmavt:2973: yasya lakṣaṇasya jñānān na te bhāvābhāvadarśane pravartete tat
YXmavt:2976: taj jñānāddhi pariniṣpanne svabhāve bhāvā'bhāvapradarśanaṃ na
YXmavt:2985: taṃ yadi bhāvam eva gṛhṇātyevaṃ bhāvaḥ samāropito bhavati /
YXmavt:2986: yady abhāvam eva gṛhṇātyevam apodito bhavati /
YXmavt:2989: atha dvayata eva gṛhṇātyevam apodito bhavati yasmādetad dvayābhāvena
YXmavt:2991: athavā taṃ bhāvā'bhāvasvarūpeṇa gṛhṇātyevaṃ samāropito bhavati /
YXmavt:2992: athā'bhāvam eva gṛhṇātyevaṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānañcā'poditam bhavatīti /
YXmavt:2995: arthād abhūtakalpāc ca dvayābhāvāc ca deśitaḥ // iti /
YXmavt:2996: tatra svabhāvo lakṣaṇam iha tu cihnam iti nāsti punaruktatā /
YXmavt:2997: yajjñānān na pravarteta taddhi tattvasya lakṣaṇaṃ /
YXmavt:2998: iti pudgalādisamāropāpavādadarśanaṃ yaj jñānān na pravartate tan
YXmavt:3002: uddiṣṭatvād ityata āha - aviparyāsatattvam iti vistaraḥ /
YXmavt:3005: mūlatattve tad anyatattvāntarbhāvaḥ pūrvaṃ pratijñāta ityataḥ pṛcchati
YXmavt:3013: trividho hy anityārthaḥ - asadarthaḥ utpādavyārthaḥ samalāmalatārthaś
YXmavt:3026: duḥkham api trividhaṃ - upādānaduḥkhaṃ lakṣaṇaduḥkhaṃ sambandhaduḥkhañca
YXmavt:3028: aparijñātenehā'mutra vā duḥkham upādīyata iti duḥkhaṃ /
YXmavt:3029: yathā ca tenā'parijñātena duḥkham upādīyate tat pradarśayann āha - [p.89
YXmavt:3034: parikalpitasvabhāvā'bhiniveśād duḥkhaprabandha ityevam uktaṃ na punaḥ
YXmavt:3038: vasturūpeṇopādīyata ityevam upādānataḥ kalpitaḥ svabhāvo duḥkhaṃ /
YXmavt:3039: paratantraḥ svabhāvo lakṣaṇato duḥkham iti sambadhyate /
YXmavt:3040: tisro hi duḥkhatā - duḥkhaduḥkhatā vipariṇāmadaḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā
YXmavt:3042: tāś ca tisro'pi duḥkhatāḥ paratantraduḥkhatā iti lakṣaṇato duḥkhaṃ /
YXmavt:3048: tad dharmasya pariniṣpannasyā'pi duḥkhasambandhād duḥkham ucyate /
YXmavt:3049: atraiva mūlatattve yathākramam iti tatropādānato duḥkhaṃ parikalpitaḥ /
YXmavt:3057: ] śaśaviṣāṇādisvarūpavad bhrāntyā na kenacit prakāreṇa yenāpi sattvaṃ
YXmavt:3060: etad eva pratipādayann āha - paratantralakṣaṇaṃ tathā nāsti yathā
YXmavt:3062: na tu sarvathā nāsti yathā cā'sti tathā
YXmavt:3068: tasmāt prakṛtir eva svabhāva evā'sya śūnyatā /
YXmavt:3073: tatra parikalpitasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇā'bhāvād alakṣaṇam eva
YXmavt:3075: ata evāha - parikalpitasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇam eva nāstītyalakṣaṇam
YXmavt:3079: na tu tad yathā bālaiḥ parikalpyate dvayatvena /
YXmavt:3082: evaṃ parikalpitenātmanā nairātmyam asya darśītaṃ bhavati /
YXmavt:3085: eveti svalakṣaṇam asya nairātmyam iti pariniṣpannasya dharmasya
YXmavt:3089: yat tu yasyātmā svabhāvo na bhavati tat tenā'nātmetyayam anayor viśeṣa
YXmavt:3091: arthataḥ ko'pi viśeṣo nāsti vyavasthānabhedena tu bhedaḥ /
YXmavt:3092: yasmādyadyatra nāsti tena tasya niḥsvabhāvatām upādāya nairātmyam
YXmavt:3093: itarasya tu tatrā'niṣpannasvabhāvatām upādāya śūnyatvam iti / [p.91]
YXmavt:3098: evaṃ yāvat trividhaṃ nairātmyam ityuktam aviparyāsatattvaṃ //3-7//
YXmavt:3100: tad anantaraṃ phalahetutattvaṃ vaktavyam ityata āha - phalahetumayantattvaṃ
YXmavt:3107: tac ca na vijñāyate kathaṃ mūlatattvaṃ duḥkhādisatyasvabhāvam ityataḥ
YXmavt:3108: pṛcchati - kathaṃ trividhaṃ mūlatattvaṃ duḥkhādisatyam iti ?
YXmavt:3115: sa eva samudayo na jñāyata ityata āha - trividhaḥ samudayārthaḥ /
YXmavt:3116: vāsanā'tha samutthānam avisaṃyoga eva ca // iti /
YXmavt:3121: asti hi parikalpite svabhāve'stītyabhiniveśam upādāya laukikā dharmā
YXmavt:3122: vikalpakleśavāsanāṃ vyavasthāpayanti na tu vigatābhiniveśā lokottarā /
YXmavt:3128: sa punaḥ kiṃsvarūpa ityata āha - karmakleśā iti /
YXmavt:3132: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yāvadāvaraṇair na visaṃyuktā tathatā tāvat
YXmavt:3134: āvaraṇair avisaṃyuktā vā tathatā samudayadharmateti samudayanāmmlābha
YXmavt:3137: tac ca na vijñāyata ityata āha - trividho nirodhaḥ -
YXmavt:3139: tatra svabhāvā'nutpattiḥ parikalpitasya yasya hi niḥsvabhāvatvād
YXmavt:3146: tat punar na vijñāyata ityata āha - pratisaṃkhyānirodhatathatākhyam iti
YXmavt:3148: tatrā'nāsveṇa jñānenāśrayād bīja uddhṛte rāgādimalānām atyantam
YXmavt:3153: eṣa trividho nirodhaḥ kalpitādau mūlatattve yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vijñeyaḥ / [p.93]
YXmavt:3157: atas tathatālambanādyo nirodhaḥ sa prakṛtinirodha ity ucyate /
YXmavt:3163: tad anantaraṃ tu mārgasatyam antarbhāvayitavyam ityataḥ pṛcchati -
YXmavt:3168: parikalpitato'tyantam asanneveti tasya parijñānam eva na prahāṇaṃ /
YXmavt:3171: paratantro hi yathā khyāti tathā'sattvaṃ vijñeyaṃ na tu
YXmavt:3181: dvividhā hi parijñā - jñānaparijñā prahāṇaparijñā ca /
YXmavt:3187: evam atra mūlatattve parijñā prahāṇasākṣātkriyāyāṃ mārgasatya
YXmavt:3189: atra ca satyacatuṣṭayena yaḥ saṅkleśo yataś ca tayoś ca viśuddhir yā
YXmavt:3195: yata ādāvaudārikeṇa sattvān paripācayati paripakvāṃs tu sūkṣmeṇa
YXmavt:3196: vimocayati ataḥ pūrvam audārikaṃ paścāt sūkṣmaṃ /
YXmavt:3202: sarvatattvānāṃ mūlatattve'ntarbhāvaḥ pratijñāta ityataḥ pṛcchati - tan
YXmavt:3207: prajñaptiḥ pratipatīr udbhāvanā caudārikatattvaṃ mūlatattve veditavyaṃ
YXmavt:3208: etad eva pratipādayann āha - trividhā hi saṃvṛtir iti vistaraḥ /
YXmavt:3209: asato'rthasya rūpaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭaśceti vyavasthānaṃ prajñaptisaṃvṛtiḥ /
YXmavt:3212: abhilāpāpekṣayā yad vyavahriyate rūpaṃ vedaneti vā tat
YXmavt:3215: pratipattisaṃvṛtir vikalpena yena rūpādayo ghaṭādayaś ca [p.95]
YXmavt:3216: vijñānanirbhāsād abahirbhūtam api bahirbhūtam iva vasturūpeṇa yathā
YXmavt:3222: tayā trividhayā saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtisatyatvaṃ mūlatattve yathākramaṃ
YXmavt:3244: sa punaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ kena kāraṇena paramārtha ucyate ?
YXmavt:3246: arthaprāptipratyayā hi paramārthas tridhā mataḥ / iti /
YXmavt:3250: paramo hi lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ tasyārtho viṣaya iti kṛtvā tathatā
YXmavt:3252: tadeva pradarśayann āha - paramasya jñānasyārtha iti kṛtveti /
YXmavt:3254: jñānā'pṛthaktvāt tasmin kāla ālambanaṃ na vartate
YXmavt:3256: tadyathā yeṣāṃ vijñaptimātraṃ kṣamate na teṣāṃ rūpādivijñaptimātraṃ
YXmavt:3259: kathaṃ paramārtha ityata āha - paramo'rtha iti kṛtvā /
YXmavt:3270: viṣayadvāreṇa parama ucyamāne katham anyo'nyasamarthanaṃ na syāt ?
YXmavt:3274: katham asaṃskṛtaṃ nirvāṇākhyaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ ca mārgākhyaṃ
YXmavt:3279: tasmān na mārgaḥ paramārthasatyaṃ na cā'pariniṣpanne
YXmavt:3283: athavā katham asaṃkṛtaṃ nirvāṇākhyaṃ saṃskṛtañca mārgākhyaṃ
YXmavt:3287: eṣā ca dvayalakṣaṇarahitatvaṃ paratantrasyeti na nirvāṇamārgayoḥ
YXmavt:3289: tadidam avācyaṃ yatas tatra dvayābhāvaḥ pariniṣpanna eva /
YXmavt:3290: na tu dvayābhāva eva pariniṣpanna iti tad anyapratiṣedhaḥ /
YXmavt:3298: yasmān na punar jñeye viparyāsam āpadyate tasmān na mārgo'pi
YXmavt:3299: pariniṣpanna ityataśca dvayor api saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtayoḥ pariniṣpannatvaṃ
YXmavt:3304: yathābhidhānam asambhavāt parikalpitād eva tat nānyasmāt tasya tu
YXmavt:3305: svarūpaṃ na jñāyata ityata āha - yasmin vastunīti vistaraḥ /
YXmavt:3311: etad uktaṃ bhavati - saṃketasaṃstavānusmaraṇānugatatyā buddhyā sarveṣāṃ
YXmavt:3312: laukikānāṃ śāstravidāṃ tad avidāṃ ca vyāhṛtibhāve kvacit [p.98]
YXmavt:3317: trividham api hi svabhāvam adhikṛtya yuktiḥ kriyata iti /
YXmavt:3319: tac ca na vijñāyata ityataḥ pradarśayann āha - yat satāṃ
YXmavt:3331: ta evam āhuḥ - satām ityukte ke punaḥ santaḥ ityata āha -
YXmavt:3333: te ca tarkabhūmau bhāvābhūmau ca vyavasthitatvād dvividhāḥ /
YXmavt:3335: teṣāṃ ca kaścil lokaprasiddhānusārītyata āha pramāṇatrayaṃ niśrityeti
YXmavt:3337: pramāṇatrayaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣam anumānam āgamaś ca /
YXmavt:3338: tatra pratyakṣaṃ pañcendriyajaṃ mānasaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhādisamvedanaṃ /
YXmavt:3342: athavā pratyakṣānumānāgamaprasiddhena hetunā dṛṣṭāntena ca tat
YXmavt:3343: prasiddhasyaiva sādhyasya paramprati sādhyatvāt pramāṇatrayaṃ niśrityeti
YXmavt:3346: upapatteḥ sādhanam upapattisādhanaṃ trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ tena tat
YXmavt:3348: yuktir upāyo yena prayoganiyamena liṅgasya trirūpyam ākhyāyate /
YXmavt:3354: evaṃ pramāṇatrayaṃ niśrityopapattisādhana yuktyā yat prasiddhaṃ vastu
YXmavt:3355: trayāṇāṃ bhāvanām anyatamat tad yuktiprasiddham ucyate /
YXmavt:3358: tad anantaraṃ tu viśuddhiviṣayaṃ vaktavyam ityata āha -
YXmavt:3360: tattu yathā dvividhaṃ tat pradarśayann āha -
YXmavt:3366: tasya kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānasya gocaram iti viṣaya ityarthaḥ /
YXmavt:3381: phalahetutattvoktyā sūkṣmatattvoktyā ca viśūddhigocaraṃ dvividham api
YXmavt:3382: nirdiṣṭam eveti punar asya vidhānaṃ vyarthaṃ /
YXmavt:3384: yatas tat phalahetutattvaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca vastu vyavasthānata uktaṃ /
YXmavt:3385: atra tvāvaraṇaṃ yathā viśuddhyate tathaitan nirdiṣṭaṃ /
YXmavt:3386: idaṃ dvividhaṃ viśuddhigocaram ekasmāt pariniṣpannād eva svabhāvāt
YXmavt:3388: atraiva kāraṇam āha - na hyanyaḥ svabhāvo viśuddhijñānagocaro
YXmavt:3397: tad anantaraṃ tu saṅgrahatattvaṃ vaktavyam ityataḥ pṛcchati - kathaṃ
YXmavt:3399: saṅgrahatattvaṃ trividhe mūlatattve saṃgṛhītaṃ pradarśayann āha -
YXmavt:3403: tatra saṅgrahatattvaṃ pañca vastūnītyata āha - yathāyogaṃ pañca
YXmavt:3405: yathāyogaṃ mūlatattve pañca vastūni saṅgṛhītāni veditavyāni na tu
YXmavt:3407: pañca punar vastūni nimittaṃ nāma vikalpas tathatā samyag jñānaṃ ceti
YXmavt:3408: sarvasya jñeyasyāsmin pañcavidhe vastuni saṅgrahād etat pañcavidhaṃ
YXmavt:3412: nāma yat tasyaiva nimittasyā'nabhilāpyasyāpi sato'kṣinikocavad sūcakam
YXmavt:3418: kramaḥ punar eṣāṃ tatra saṅkleśaprajñaptivastutvān nimittam ādau /
YXmavt:3420: yathā nāma tathā saṅkleśaprajñaptivastuvikalpatvāt tad anantaraṃ
YXmavt:3422: sa ca saṅkleśas tathatāsamyag jñānena nirudhyata iti tad anantaraṃ
YXmavt:3425: tasmād bhrāntis tasya nimittaṃ prakṛtiśamas tatra jñānaṃ //
YXmavt:3426: ity anayā gāthayā'sya pañcavidhasya vastuno'rtha ity anye /
YXmavt:3436: tatra ca jñānam iti tathatālambanaṃ mārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ yaj jñānaṃ /
YXmavt:3440: evam adhikārasaṅgrahaḥ parikalpitena nāmno na svabhāvasaṅgrahaḥ iti yad
YXmavt:3442: nimittādipañcavastubhir na saṅgṛhīta iti tan na virudhyate tatra
YXmavt:3445: sadā śobhanaṃ vā tattvaṃ satattvaṃ tathatā śūnyatālambanādvayajñānaṃ
YXmavt:3448: pariniṣpannatvād ekenaiva pariniṣpannena svabhāvena saṅgraha iti /
YXmavt:3451: idānīṃ prabhedatattvaṃ katividhaṃ kathañca tanmūlatattve saṅgṛhītam
YXmavt:3452: iti na vijñāyata ityataḥ pṛcchati - prabhedatattvaṃ mūlatattve katham
YXmavt:3455: katham ityata āha - pravṛttitattvaṃ lakṣaṇatattvam iti vistaraḥ /
YXmavt:3456: yaiva ca sandhinirmocaranasūtre saptavidhā tathatā nirdiṣṭā
YXmavt:3458: prabhedatattvam ityuktā pravṛttitattvaṃ yāvat samyakpratipattitattvam iti
YXmavt:3459: tatra pravṛttitattvaṃ yā saṃsārā'navarāgratā saiva ca pravṛtti tathatā
YXmavt:3464: nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ vijñaptyāśrayabhāvād vijñptitattvam ity apare /
YXmavt:3467: saiva ca tathatā nityaṃ tathaiveti kṛtvā /
YXmavt:3469: sā punar yā teṣu saṃskāreṣu guṇadarśanena pravṛttiḥ /
YXmavt:3476: etāny api trīṇi tattvāni nityaṃ tathaiveti tathatāvacanam bhavati /
YXmavt:3482: yeṣāṃ tu sa prabandhaṣthe hetuprabhāvitatvāt paratantraḥ svabhāvaḥ /
YXmavt:3483: evaṃ yeṣāṃ yā ca pravṛttis tat pravṛttitattvam iti nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
YXmavt:3484: athavā kleśakarmajanmanām anādimān utpādaḥ saṃsārapravṛttir ityucyate
YXmavt:3496: etāni catvāri tatvāny ekam eva mūlatattvaṃ yad uta pariniṣpannaḥ
YXmavt:3508: sattvasāmyaṃ tribhiḥ proktaṃ dharmasāmyaṃ dvayena tu /
YXmavt:3514: tatpunaḥ skandhādiṣu kathaṃ daśavidham ātmadarśanam iti na jñāyata
YXmavt:3515: ityataḥ pṛcchati - katham eṣu skandhādiṣu daśavidham ātmadarśanam iti ?
YXmavt:3523: yadyātmā nāsti kathaṃ grāhaparatantraḥ sannirviṣayo grāhaḥ pravartata
YXmavt:3525: tasmāt teṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa daśavidhaṃ skandhādikauśalyam uktaṃ /
YXmavt:3526: kathaṃ punaḥ skandhādiṣv evāyam ātmagrāho natvāmā sanniścīyate ?
YXmavt:3527: yataḥ skandhādivyatirikta ātmā yuktyā parīkṣyamāṇo nopalabhyate /
YXmavt:3528: yadātmatvādīnām ātmakriyāsvarūpaṃ tat sarvam api pravartate
YXmavt:3530: ebhir daśavidhair ātmābhiniveśo nāmātmagrāhaḥ pravartate nānyair
YXmavt:3532: yad uta ekatvagrāha iti pañcopādānaskandheṣu piṇḍātmagrāhataḥ tat
YXmavt:3534: hetutvagrāha iti cakṣurādīnāṃ prayojakatvād ātmani hetutvagrāhaḥ tat
YXmavt:3538: yasya veṣṭam aniṣṭañceha janmani phalaṃ tasya śubhāśubhasya karmaṇa ātmā
YXmavt:3542: athavā yasya śubham aśubhaṃ karmabhir utpadyate sa eva tat phalānāṃ
YXmavt:3544: kartṛtvagrāha iti ātmaiva sukṛta-duṣkṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ karteti yo grāhaḥ
YXmavt:3545: yo vā karaṇādyupetas tās tāḥ kriyāḥ karoti sa ātmeti kartṛtvagrāhaḥ /
YXmavt:3546: svatantragrāha iti yat svairaṃ vaśitvaṃ sa ātmā yo'dhikāraḥ sa ātmeti
YXmavt:3548: hetvanurūpasyaiva vā phalasyotpattau vaśitvam asyeti svatantragrāhaḥ /
YXmavt:3549: adhipatitvagrāha iti yo'dhipatiḥ prabhurīśvaraḥ sa ātmeti /
YXmavt:3558: yogitvagrāha iti ātmani manaso dhāraṇaṃ yogaḥ prāṇamanasor vā nigrahaḥ
YXmavt:3559: ātmano manasāṃ saṃyogaviśeṣo yogaḥ so'syāstīti yogī /
YXmavt:3560: amuktamuktatvagrāhaśceti ātamno bandhād vimuktir iti yo vikalpaḥ //
YXmavt:3565: yatas triṣu svabhāveṣu te skandhādayo'ntarbhūtā iti kauśalyaviṣayā ete
YXmavt:3567: na tu tasminn eva kauśalya iti /
YXmavt:3568: ataḥ akuśalyatattvasyāpy adhikāratas tatrāntarbhāvo na tu svarūpata iti
YXmavt:3569: veditavyaṃ tadyathā phalahetutattvamārgasatyaṃ triṣvantarbhūtam uktam iti
YXmavt:3570: nanvevam api naiva vijñāyante yathā'ntarbhūtā iti pṛcchati katham
YXmavt:3573: teṣu triṣu svabhāveṣu te skandhādayo'ntarbhūtā ityadhikṛtaṃ /
YXmavt:3574: tatra dhātvādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ skandhānām antarbhūtatvaṃ prakāśayitavyaṃ
YXmavt:3581: tac ca yā'nyatra nāmnopalabdhis tatra viṣayasvabhāvaḥ parikalpyate /
YXmavt:3583: vikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ yo rūpasya paratantraḥ svabhāva iti
YXmavt:3585: kim arthaṃ punar idaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpam ucyata ityata āha - tatra hi
YXmavt:3590: dharmatārūpaṃ yo rūpasya pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāva iti /
YXmavt:3593: yathā rūpam tridhā bhittvā triṣu svabhāveṣv antarbhāvitam evaṃ
YXmavt:3600: tatra pratibhāseṣu vedanādiṣu yo'tyantam asadbhūto grāhyagrāhakabhāvo
YXmavt:3601: rūpapratibhāseṣu yathā grāhyabhāvaḥ parikalpyate sā parikalpitā
YXmavt:3603: yasmin grāhyagrāheka vikalpaḥ kriyate sā vikalpitā vedanā yāvad
YXmavt:3607: evaṃ dhātvāyatanādiṣv api yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vistareṇa vaktavyaṃ /
YXmavt:3608: rūpavedane yāvat saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtam iti yo nāmābhidheyo bhāvaḥ so'pi
YXmavt:3614: nanu paratantra eva manuṣyādibhāvena nāmnocyate na parikalpita ity
YXmavt:3619: yathā hi nāmārthe pravartate tathā tathaiva nāsti /
YXmavt:3620: bālas tu tat svabhāvam abhiniviśanti tac ca mithyā'dhyavasitaṃ na tu
YXmavt:3624: yadi vṛkṣādiśabdānāṃ tad arthānāṃ cābhinnarūpatā evaṃ nāmnas
YXmavt:3628: namno'pi vānyat vācakārthasya ca vācyaṃ prasajyata
YXmavt:3632: abhāvavācakānām arthavatām asattvaṃ tad arthasyābhāvarūpatvāt tad
YXmavt:3635: śabda eva hi tatra vṛkṣo nārthaḥ /
YXmavt:3640: vailakṣaṇye ca vācyavācakaniyamo na syāt niyamakāraṇābhāvāt /
YXmavt:3643: utpanno'pi punaḥ punar utpādayitavya iti prasaṅga punaḥ panar
YXmavt:3645: nāpyabhivyañjayati yasmād arthaṃ gṛhītvā nāma kriyate na ca
YXmavt:3647: tenaiva nāmnā tamevārtham anyo na gṛhṇāti yas tan na jānāti /
YXmavt:3650: na ca vyaṅgyeṣu ghaṭapaṭādiṣu vyañjakaniyamo dṛṣṭa iti sarvo'rthaḥ
YXmavt:3653: yatmāt kuthārajalādīnāṃ gandhādyutpādayitṛtvam iṣṭaṃ na tu
YXmavt:3657: evaṃ triṣu svabhāveṣu skandhādīnām anantarbhāvād daśavidhaṃ
YXmavt:3661: skandhādyartho nokta ityataḥ sa idānīm ucyate //3-16//
YXmavt:3668: vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā
YXmavt:3669: dūre yadvā'ntike ityevam anekārthena bahūnām atītānāgatādīnāṃ
YXmavt:3675: atra kāraṇam āha - skandhānāṃ rūpādilakṣaṇasya vedanādilakṣaṇebhyaḥ
YXmavt:3678: kim atra kāraṇam ebhis tribhiraṅgaiḥ skandhārtho vyavasthāpyate ?
YXmavt:3679: rāśyartho hi skandhārtha ityata evaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
YXmavt:3682: yathā rūpaskandha evaṃ vedanādayo'pi skandhā veditavyāḥ /
YXmavt:3683: tatra yo'yam ekātmagrāho yathā puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca
YXmavt:3685: pratipakṣeṇa yathā skandhārthe kauśalyaṃ kāryaṃ tathoktaṃ /
YXmavt:3690: trividhaḥ sammoha ekatvasammohaḥ saṃvṛti sammoho lakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇasammohaś
YXmavt:3699: bījārtho dhātvarthaḥ tadyathā svarṇo sati svarṇadhātur ucyate
YXmavt:3701: sa ca phalabhedāt tridhā bhidyate - grāhakadhātuḥ grāhyadhātuḥ tad
YXmavt:3704: cakṣurdhāturādir yeṣāṃ manaḥparyantās te cakṣur dhātvādayaḥ /
YXmavt:3709: te'pyevaṃ sabhāgānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ hetubhāvād dhātava ucyante /
YXmavt:3713: te'pi sabhāgānām eva cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ hetubhūtatvād dhātava
YXmavt:3721: evaṃ tvālayavijñānam eva dhātuśabdavācyaṃ na cakṣurādaya iti cintyam
YXmavt:3725: atra pūrvacakṣurādaya uttaracakṣurādīnām eva hetavo bhavanti na
YXmavt:3726: tatrānyaḥ kaścid ātmā'nyo vā hetuvidyata ityevaṃ dhātukauśalyād
YXmavt:3733: aparaśabdasya ca sāmānyatvāt praśnaḥ kim aparam iti /
YXmavt:3735: aparaśabdo'vatiṣṭhata iti jñāpanārtham āha - āyatanam iti /
YXmavt:3764: yad uktaṃ cakṣuāradyāyatanānām anugrahopaghātāt tad adhiṣṭhāna eva
YXmavt:3766: rūpapratiṣedhena cakṣurādīnām āyatanānām apy asattvādātmavad iti
YXmavt:3769: yasmāt parikalpitarūpasyaivātra pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate na vikalpatārūpasya
YXmavt:3773: ya ālayavijñānasya sādhāraṇārthapratibhāso yaś ca sattvapratibhāsaḥ
YXmavt:3777: nanvevaṃ dvayam āśritya cakṣur vijñānādaya utpadyanta iti sūtravacanena
YXmavt:3781: utpannānutpannāvasthayor bhāvād abhāvāc ca svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
YXmavt:3782: tasmād avaśyaṃ vijñānanirbhāsād bhinnā rūpādayo'bhyupagantavyā iti
YXmavt:3786: vasanāpariṇāmāc ca rūpādyābhāsaṃ punar vijñānaṃ jāyate /
YXmavt:3787: evaṃ vijñānanirbhāsātmakatvena vāsanāhito vijñānapratyaya ukta iti
YXmavt:3791: athavā yathā bāhyārthavādibhir vijñānena sahaja ālambanapratyayo
YXmavt:3802: api cālambyālambakabhāvaḥ sarvatropacaryata eva na mukhyo'sti /
YXmavt:3803: nahi vijñānam utpannam anutpannaṃ vā viṣayam ālambate /
YXmavt:3812: notpadyamānasya nirarthakaṃ yasmād viṣayasadbhāve vijñānaṃ tan
YXmavt:3817: na vikalaiḥ pratyayaiḥ kāryam utpadyate atiprasaṅgāt /
YXmavt:3819: na ca bāhyārtha ālambanapratyayo vijñānasya tena vināpi bhāvāt /
YXmavt:3820: tasmāt sarvam eva vijñānaṃ taimirikādīnām iva
YXmavt:3828: asyotpādādidam utpadyate yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti vistaraḥ
YXmavt:3835: etad eva pratipādayann āha - saṃskārādīnāṃ jarāmaraṇaparyantānāṃ
YXmavt:3837: saṃskārādīnāṃ hy anityānāṃ nityaḥ puruṣādiko hetur viṣamo visadṛśa
YXmavt:3840: na ca nityasya svarūpavikriyā'stīti viṣamahetau hetutvakalpanād
YXmavt:3847: satyātmani saṃskārādīnām avidyādipratyayapravṛttitvaṃ na tv astīti
YXmavt:3851: phalāpavādo na santy avidyādipratyayāḥ saṃskāradaya iti kalpanād iti /
YXmavt:3852: tad yathā - sucaritaduścaritaparalokāpavādināṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti
YXmavt:3858: avidyādīnāṃ sattāmātreṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ hy utpādanasamarthānām api
YXmavt:3864: vā yaḥ kartṛtvagrāhas tasyaṃ pratipakṣeṇa veditavyaṃ /
YXmavt:3865: na hy atrātmānyo vā'vidyāvyatirekeṇa śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā /
YXmavt:3876: satyaṃ vaden na ca kruddhed dadyād alpoo'pi yācitaḥ /
YXmavt:3877: ebhis tribhir iha shtānair devānāṃ samitiṃ vrajet //
YXmavt:3879: athavā sthānaṃ sambhavaḥ asthānaṃ punar asambhavaḥ /
YXmavt:3883: tac ca saptavidham api triṣvantarbhavati karmakleśajanmapāratantryeṣu /
YXmavt:3886: tatra gamanaṃ duścaritāyatattvaṃ pāratantryañceti pradarśayann āha -
YXmavt:3890: teṣām ekāntena duḥkhatvān na kasyacit tatra gamanecchā bhavati /
YXmavt:3891: karmaṇāṃ balavattvād durgatigetutvāc ca duścaritasyānicchato'pi tatra
YXmavt:3907: abhedena kuśalapakṣaṃ nivṛṇvantīti nivaraṇāni bhedena punar yathākramaṃ
YXmavt:3908: pravrajatyābhiratiṃ tad anurūpe kāyavākkarmāṇi sabrahmacāribhiḥ samyak
YXmavt:3916: yatra duḥkhaṃ nāsti tac ca nirvāṇaṃ tasyākaraṇam aprāptir nirvāṇaṃ na
YXmavt:3918: athavā duḥkhasyānto yasmād duḥkhādanyaduḥkhaṃ na sandhīyate tat
YXmavt:3919: tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ na karotītyapratisandhikaṃ duḥkham na karotītyarthaḥ /
YXmavt:3921: samotpattau pāratantryaṃ dvayor apūrvācaramayor iti sahitayor ityarthaḥ /
YXmavt:3924: cakravartinos tu cātur dvīpaka iti kecit /
YXmavt:3929: tathā hi yadekasmiñcāturmahādvīpake tuṣiteṣu manuṣyeṣu ca
YXmavt:3934: tuṣiteṣūpapattiṃ manuṣyeṣu ca janmaparigrahādikaṃ sarvaṃ darśayatīti
YXmavt:3945: tatra pāratantryaṃ puruṣasya prāptir na tu striyaḥ /
YXmavt:3955: te vadhādayaḥ kāyavāk-kriyāsvabhāvā dṛṣṭisampannasya na samudācaranti
YXmavt:3958: tad aprahāṇaṃ punas tat pratipakṣeṇa mārgānutpannatvāt /
YXmavt:3961: yadi hi svatantraḥ kaścit syān na duścaritena durgatiṃ gacchet /
YXmavt:3970: atra ca dvayādhipattyārthata iti yuktau kārikānukūlārtham
YXmavt:3972: tasmād bhāṣyakāra āha - teṣu tadādhipatyād iti /
YXmavt:3985: evaṃ śrotrādiṣv api yathāsambhavaṃ vistareṇa vācyaṃ /
YXmavt:3990: sthāne jīvitendriyasyādhipatyam ityatraiva kāraṇam āha - tad
YXmavt:3997: na ca tatra sparśādīnām avasthāna ādhipatyaṃ yujyate /
YXmavt:4001: putrotpattau kulāvyuparatatā vartata iti putrotpattiḥ kulasandhānaṃ /
YXmavt:4002: etad eva darśayann āha - prasavādhipatyād iti /
YXmavt:4005: yatra stīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyañcas tastatra kulavyavasthānam asti /
YXmavt:4007: kāmāvacareṣv api ca deveṣu strīndriye puruṣendriye ca sati
YXmavt:4009: nahi gandharvādīnāṃ tatrādhipatyaṃ satyapi gandharvādau paṇḍakādiṣu
YXmavt:4015: vedanendriyāṇi pañca - sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saumanasyaṃ daurmanasyam upekṣā ca
YXmavt:4038: pūrvokteṣu navasu daurmanasyam adhikaṃ prakṣipya daśa bhavanti /
YXmavt:4050: samādhir ityetasmin śaikṣamārgam ājñendriyam ity ucyate
YXmavt:4055: evam indriyakauśalasya yaḥ puruṣanārāyaṇeśvarādiṣv adhipatigrāhaḥ sa
YXmavt:4064: evam prakāraścātīto hetus tatphalaṃ cetyataḥ phalasya
YXmavt:4076: kāryānutpādād anutpannasya ca vināśābhāvāt phalahetvor anupayogo
YXmavt:4087: śāstre ca yat kiñcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti vacanāt /
YXmavt:4088: satyavyavasthāyāṃ sarvā sāsravā sanimittā sukhā duḥkhā sukhāduḥkhā
YXmavt:4089: ca vedanā duḥkhasatyārtha iti pradarśayan bhāṣyakāra āha - tatra
YXmavt:4091: sarvā vedanā duḥkham iti kuta etat ?
YXmavt:4092: ata āha - yatkiñcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti kṛtveti /
YXmavt:4096: vedanānimittaṃ panar vedanāsthānīyā dharmā veditavyā iti /
YXmavt:4101: duḥkhaṃ yayā pratipattyā janyate sā pratipattiḥ samudayasatyaṃ /
YXmavt:4102: sā punar vedanāyāṃ vedanāsthāniyeṣu ca dharmeṣu tṛṣṇāhetupūrvikā
YXmavt:4104: saṃkṣepataś ca bhavasamudbhavikaṃ karmasamudaya satyam ity uktam bhavati /
YXmavt:4121: tatra guṇadoṣajñānena parataḥ svayañceti ata evāha - vṛttau yathāyogam iti /
YXmavt:4124: tatra nirodhe śāntādyākāraiḥ mārge nairyāṇikādyākārair jñānaṃ
YXmavt:4132: śrāvakayānam iti paradghoṣasaṃniśrayeṇa niryāṇāt śrāvakāyanm iti
YXmavt:4134: tenaiveti nirvāṇasaṃsārayor guṇadoṣajñānena svayam aśrutvā parato
YXmavt:4147: evaṃ yānatrayakuśalasya yogamātradarśanād ātmā yogīti grāho
YXmavt:4154: ityata āha - saṃskṛtā'saṃskṛtam iti sarvapaścād udiṣṭatvāt /
YXmavt:4155: tatra saṃskṛtaṃ saprajñaptikāt sahetukāc ca nimittāt asaṃskṛtaṃ punaḥ
YXmavt:4158: tat pradarśayann āha - tatra saprajñaptir nāmakāyādaya iti /
YXmavt:4165: ata eva dattaphalād vyavacchedārthaṃ bījasaṅgṛhītam ityāha /
YXmavt:4171: dehaḥ sendriyaṃ śarīraṃ tadābhāsam ālayavijñānaṃ dehasaṅgṛhītaṃ
YXmavt:4174: tad dvayaṃ śeṣāṇi vijñānānyadhipativastutvena bhuñjata iti bhogaḥ /
YXmavt:4180: tat saṃskṛtaṃ na kevalaṃ tadeveti darśayati /
YXmavt:4188: anye tu manyante - svabhāvaviśeṣaprajñāpanāt prajñapter nimittaṃ
YXmavt:4194: tatra mano yan nityaṃ manyanākāram iti /
YXmavt:4195: ahaṃ mameti yan nityaṃ manyate tanmata ucyate /
YXmavt:4196: tac ca samprayuktam ātmamohātmadṛṣṭyātmasnehātmamānaiḥ pañcabhiś ca
YXmavt:4204: asaṃskṛtaṃ punaḥ praśamaś ca nirodhaḥ praśamārthaś ca tathateti yuktaṃ
YXmavt:4208: nanu ca nirodhena tathatayā na kaścit sambandho'sti kathaṃ praśamārthatvaṃ
YXmavt:4214: evaṃ vigrahabhedād ekābhidhānena nirvāṇamārgayor grahaṇaṃ praśama iti /
YXmavt:4217: yadi karmakleśābhyām anabhisaṃskṛtād asaṃskṛtena ca prabhāvitād
YXmavt:4218: asaṃskṛtam iti brūyān na doṣaḥ syād iti /
YXmavt:4219: ityetenārthena skandhādiṣu jñānaṃ skandhādikauśalyaṃ veditavyam iti / [p.123]
YXmavt:4226: ataḥ samāsato dvividham ityāha - ādarśatattvaṃ dṛśyatattvañca /
YXmavt:4229: kim arthaṃ punas tad ādarśatattvam ityucyate ?
YXmavt:4244: katham ityata āha - dṛṣṭānasanniśrayeṇa yuktyā nigrahād iti /
YXmavt:4251: tac ca pañca vastūni tatra sarvajñeyānupraveśāt /
YXmavt:4255: tena hy ātmagrāhavastu sarvābhiprāyamukhena praviśatīti yathā pūrvam
YXmavt:4269: sūtre pratipakaṣatvena bodhipakṣo'numata iti pradarśanārtham āha -
YXmavt:4273: te punaḥ saptatriṃśat - catvāri smṛtypasthānāni yāvadāryāṣṭāṅga
YXmavt:4275: tad bhāvanā bṛṃhaṇāropaṇā abhyāso bahulā kriyeti paryāyāḥ /
YXmavt:4277: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanaiva pūrvam ucyate nānyā
YXmavt:4289: sa ca guṇadoṣānavabodhaḥ sukhādyabhiniveśaś ca satyadarśanād vinivartata
YXmavt:4294: tathā hi pratidinam abhisaṃskriyamāṇo vikriyata eva kāya iti kāyena
YXmavt:4297: kim artham etad ityāha - tasya sadauṣṭhulyasaṃskāralakṣaṇatvād iti /
YXmavt:4298: yasmād duḥkhasatyasya sadauṣṭhulyāḥ saṃskārāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāvaḥ
YXmavt:4299: kāyena ca dauṣṭhulyaṃ prabhāvyate tasmāt kāyaparīkṣayā duḥkhasatyam
YXmavt:4301: dauṣṭhulyaṃ na vijñāyata ityata āha - dauṣṭhulyaṃ hi saṃskāraduḥkhateti
YXmavt:4303: sa ca sarvaviplavastv iti dauṣṭhulyamāryāṇāṃ pratikūlatvāc ca duḥkhatā
YXmavt:4305: anartho janmedaṃ sati hi janane santi ripavo
YXmavt:4307: anarthās te na syur yadi na bhavato nāśavibhavā-
YXmavt:4308: vajāte vṛkṣe syān na hi dahanadavavāyucyutir api //
YXmavt:4311: sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ vastvāryā duḥkhatā paśyanti nā'nāsavaṃ mārgasatyasya
YXmavt:4313: sūtre'py uktaṃ - samāsataḥ pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham iti /
YXmavt:4319: sā tv abījāpyarthasantāne kadācid āhārādyapacārād bhavati /
YXmavt:4320: na cāsau dauṣṭhulyaṃ bhavitum arhatya nāsravatvād iti /
YXmavt:4324: tasmāt sukhādyavakāśasahitena kāyena pratikṣaṇabhāvinā tad dauṣṭhulyaṃ
YXmavt:4333: ata eva saṃskāraduḥkhatayā sarvasāsravaṃ vastvāryaiḥ duḥkhatvenālokita
YXmavt:4337: tatra sukhā vedanā tat saṃyogāviyogatṛṣṇāyā hetuḥ /
YXmavt:4339: aduḥkhasukhā tad avasthābhir atitṛṣṇāyās tat saṃyogāviyogatṛṣṇāyāś ca
YXmavt:4341: sa duḥkhavedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ kāmasukham abhinandatīti vacanāt duḥkhāpi
YXmavt:4344: sa hi vedanāṃ svarūpataḥ kāraṇataḥ kāryato'nityato
YXmavt:4354: tasmāt tat parīkṣayā nirodhasatyam avatarati śāntatvena /
YXmavt:4396: vīryaṃ caturdhā pravartata iti vipakṣapratipakṣayor utpanānutpannabhedena
YXmavt:4398: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāyeti vistara
YXmavt:4399: itīdam āgamena vīryasyaiva caturdhā pravṛttiṃ darśayati /
YXmavt:4401: tatrāyāṃ śeṣo granghaḥ - prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam
YXmavt:4403: evam anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya
YXmavt:4405: evam anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādaya chandañjanayatīti
YXmavt:4438: tatra cchandsamādhir yadā chandādhipatyād vīryabhāvanāyāṃ sagauravaṃ
YXmavt:4440: vīryasamādhir yadā vīryam ārabhamāṇaḥ sātatyaprayogāt spṛśati
YXmavt:4442: cittasamādhir yadā pūrvasamādhibījam āgamya citta eva cittaṃ dhārayan
YXmavt:4445: sthitiratra cittasthitiḥ samādhir veditavya iti samādhigrahaṇaṃ
YXmavt:4447: yata ārabdhavīryasya cittakarmaṇyatā catvāra ṛddhipādā bhavanti ataḥ
YXmavt:4450: kim prayojanā kiṃ hetukā cetyata āha -
YXmavt:4454: te ca pañcadoṣā na vijñāyanta ityataḥ pṛcchati katame pañca doṣā iti /
YXmavt:4458: ete hi ṣaḍdoṣā ityata āha - tatra layauddhatyam eko doṣaḥ kriyata iti
YXmavt:4472: yadyevaṃ tena vaktavyam eṣāṃ prahāṇāya katham aṣṭau prahāṇasaṃskārā
YXmavt:4479: kathaṃ punar ete kausīdyaprahāṇāya vyavasthāpyanta ityata āha - te
YXmavt:4481: āśrayo'rthāśritas tasya nimittaṃ phalam eva ca / iti /
YXmavt:4486: katham ityato bravīti - sampratyaye saty abhilāṣād iti /
YXmavt:4489: katham ityata āha - prārabdhavīryasya samādhiviśeṣā'dhigamād iti /
YXmavt:4497: atra ca vīryaṃ sahetukaṃ saphalaṃ ca kausīdyapratipakṣeṇoktaṃ /
YXmavt:4503: smṛtyādīnāṃ punar lakṣaṇavivakṣayedam āha - te punaḥ smṛtyādayo
YXmavt:4509: upasthitasmṛtir hi samprajanyavān bhavatyevetyata āha - smṛtyasampramoṣe
YXmavt:4514: etad uktaṃ bhavati - sūpasthitasmṛtiravavāde līnaṃ cittam uddhtaṃ vā
YXmavt:4516: layauddhatyavigamāya ca tad abhisaṃskaroti layauddhatyavigamāc copekṣāṃ
YXmavt:4519: atra ca karmaṇyatāsthitir iti svārthe bhāvapratyayaḥ svapeṭatvādivat //
YXmavt:4530: pratilabhate chandādhipatyato yāvat pravicayādhipatyataḥ na tv
YXmavt:4539: ataścandagrahaṇenātrābhilāṣalakṣaṇā śraddhaiva gṛhyate na tu cchanda iti
YXmavt:4550: śraddhadhāno hi saṃsāracārakān niḥsaraṇārthaṃ vīryam ārabhate /
YXmavt:4556: kiṃ tarhi ropite mokṣabhāgīyakuśalamūle chandādīnām ādhipatyata
YXmavt:4558: etad eva pradarśayann āha - chandādhipatyataḥ śraddhāyā indriyatvam iti
YXmavt:4566: atra tvetad vaktavyaṃ - ropite mokṣabhāgīye kuśalamūle ropitāvasthātaś
YXmavt:4568: yasmāt tadavasthāyāṃ tad ādhipatyāt teṣām indriyatvam avasthāpyata
YXmavt:4571: tānyeva śraddhādīni balavanti balānyucyante indriyānantaram uktānīti
YXmavt:4572: teṣāṃ punar balavattvaṃ kuta ityata āha -
YXmavt:4575: etad eva pradarśayann āha - yadā tānīti śraddhādīndriyāṇi /
YXmavt:4578: vyavakīryante atyarthaṃ tanutvād antarāntarā samudācārābhāvān na
YXmavt:4580: tānīndriyāṇi vipakṣair avakīryante tadā tad vipakṣasyānirlikhitatvāt
YXmavt:4583: tatra hy abhedenendriyāṇy abhipretāni atra tu nirvedhabhāgīyasya
YXmavt:4586: atra evātrāha etānyevendriyāṇi balāny ucyanta iti /
YXmavt:4588: ayaṃ heturasyaiva phalasya idañca phalam asyaiva hetor ityevaṃ
YXmavt:4591: upasthitasmṛter vipakṣepābhāvāc cittaṃ samādhīyate ekāgraṃ bhavati /
YXmavt:4600: dvau dvau nirvedhabhāgīyāvīndriyāṇi balāni ca / iti /
YXmavt:4602: śraddhādiprabhāvitāni vā bhavanti tathā nirvedhabhāgīyāny api /
YXmavt:4608: mṛdutvād ayuktatvād eṣāṃ kuśalānām eṣu balānām indriyāṇyeva /
YXmavt:4610: adhimātratvād eṣām indiryāṇām asambhavāt kṣāntayo'gradharmāś ca
YXmavt:4628: tad anyasāsravadharmaśreṣṭhatvāc ca laukikā agradharmā ity ucyante /
YXmavt:4629: teṣāṃ tv agratā tad anantaraṃ darśanamārgotpatteḥ /
YXmavt:4630: te ca kṣaṇikāḥ śeṣāṇi nirvedhabhāgīyāni santānavanti /
YXmavt:4643: adṛṣṭapūrvasya tattvasya tat prathamata ālocanād darśanaṃ
YXmavt:4644: āryabhūmiprāpakatvān mārga ityato darśanamārga ity ucyate /
YXmavt:4648: tatra tattvābhisambodho bodhinirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ tatra ṣaṭ smṛṭyādīni
YXmavt:4650: dharmapravicayastv avabodhātmakatvād bodhiḥ itareṣāṃ ca sahāyabhāvād
YXmavt:4652: anyaḥ punar āha - ānantaryamārgagṛhīto dharmapravicayo bodhyaṅgaṃ
YXmavt:4654: tatra bodher āśrāṅgaṃ smṛtiḥ smṛtbalena tasminnālambane'vikṣepaṇāt /
YXmavt:4662: kim arthaṃ punar asaṅkleśāṅgaṃ tridhā deśitam iti /
YXmavt:4669: kathaṃ nidānam ityato bravīti - dauṣṭhulyahetukatvāt saṅkleśasya tasyāś
YXmavt:4689: anye tv āhuḥ - prahāṇair mārgair darśanaheye saṃkleśe prahīṇe tat
YXmavt:4691: jñeye suniścitā yā prajñā sātra prajñopekṣety ucyate kṛtakṛtyatvāt
YXmavt:4703: kramaḥ punar eṣāṃ kāritrā'nukrameṇa bhāvanāmārga iti vistaraḥ /
YXmavt:4709: lokottarāt tu nirvikalpāt nirvikalpasya sato'pi samyag
YXmavt:4713: sā punaḥ kiṃviṣayetyata āha - yayā svādhigamam iti /
YXmavt:4717: tayā samyag dṛṣṭyā paricchinnasya tattvasya samyag vācā samyak
YXmavt:4718: saṅkalpena ca paratra prāpaṇāt samyaksaṅkalpaḥ samyagvāk ca
YXmavt:4720: ata evāha - samutthānayā vācā tat prāpaṇād iti /
YXmavt:4721: samyak saṃkalpo hi vācaḥ samutthānaṃ nāvitarkya nāvicārya vācaṃ
YXmavt:4723: samāhito'pi tābhyāṃ samanvāgato veditavyas tad utpattilābhāt na tu
YXmavt:4726: katham ityata āha - tair hi samyag vākkarmāntājīvair yathākramaṃ -
YXmavt:4733: pareṣāṃ niyogādanena tattvam adhigataṃ tathā hy upaśamasaṃsaktaṃ
YXmavt:4738: samyakkarmānto hi duścarita-virodhītyatas tena sambandhāgato jīvitahetor
YXmavt:4739: apy akṛtyaṃ na karotītyata āryakāntaśīlavānayam iti sambhāvanā
YXmavt:4742: katham ityata āha - dharmeṇa mātrayā ca cīvarādyeṣaṇād iti
YXmavt:4745: tena saṃlekhe sambhāvanā bhavati niścayenāsyopakaraṇatṛṣṇā prahīṇā
YXmavt:4746: tathā hyasau kevalam āśrayasthityartham eva nyāyena mātrayā ca
YXmavt:4748: tatra samyag dṛṣṭyā ābhimāniko na bhavati yathābhūtaṃ
YXmavt:4750: samyaksaṅkalpena samutthāpitavācā siṃhanādaṃ nadati samyag vāk
YXmavt:4753: tattu na jñāyata ityāha - samyagvyāyāmsmṛtisamādhaya iti /
YXmavt:4754: te ca kasya vipakṣasya pratipakṣā ityata āha - eṣāṃ punar yathākramaṃ -
YXmavt:4759: katham ityata āha - teneti samyag vyāyāmena mārgabhāvanāt /
YXmavt:4762: tena bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya tat pratipakṣaṃ
YXmavt:4777: naikāntike vā mārge yuganaddavāhini vā tad
YXmavt:4780: samāpattyāvaraṇātmakam akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ tasya tṛtīyasya samyak
YXmavt:4787: samādhipariśuddhiṃ samyak samādhinā samāpattyāvaraṇena viṣamam iti
YXmavt:4803: sā ca smṛtyupasthānabhāvanām ārabhya yāvad balabhāvaneti /
YXmavt:4805: iyaṃ hi śaikṣāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgabhāvanā mārgabhāvanā ca /
YXmavt:4830: eṣa hi teṣu viśeṣa ucyate na kevalam anupalambhayogenaiva manasi kurvanti
YXmavt:4839: yadi na visaṃyogāya kimarthaṃ tarhi pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatītyata āha -
YXmavt:4862: tatra yo gotra eva vartate na cittotpādādiṣu sa gotrastha ihābhipretaḥ /
YXmavt:4863: sa punar uttarāvasthāsv anuvartate na nivartate /
YXmavt:4864: kecit tacca gotraṃ kuśalamūlasvabhāvam iti varṇayanti /
YXmavt:4865: kuśalamūlānyeva hi kānicic chrāvakagotram ity ucyante /
YXmavt:4871: aśaikṣāvasthāyāṃ tu śrāvaka ity ucyate pratyekabuddha iti vā /
YXmavt:4879: tasya prayogamūlabhūtatvāt tasminn utpanne prayogāvatāra iti tad
YXmavt:4887: ata evoktaṃ - uttarottaraphalaṃ gotrāc cittotpāda ityevam ādi /
YXmavt:4906: ata āha - tata ūrdhvam avasthā'bhāvād iti /
YXmavt:4926: eṣaiva bodhisattvasya darśanamārgaḥ niryāṇāvasthā tad uttarāsu ṣaṭsu
YXmavt:4932: bhavati buddhatva iti buddhair bhagavadbhiḥ sammukhavyākaraṇena vyākriyate
YXmavt:4935: pratisamvidaḥ pratilabhata ity anuttaro mahādhārmakathiko bhavati /
YXmavt:4945: anye tu niḥśeṣāgantukamalāpagamāt suviśuddho dharmadhātur eva
YXmavt:4950: svābhāviko yasmin kāye vyavasthite'bhisambudhyate yena kāyena
YXmavt:4951: niṣṭhāgatair bodhisattvaiḥ saha parṣanmaṇḍalena dharmasaṃgītim anubhavati
YXmavt:4959: aśuddhaśuddhaśuddhā ca viśuddhā ca yathārhataḥ / iti /
YXmavt:4960: tatrāśuddhāvasthā hetvavasthām upādāya yāvat prayogād iti [p.144]
YXmavt:4974: teṣāṃ ca bahudhā vyavasthānaṃ kathaṃ vijñāpanīyam ityata āha -
YXmavt:4979: āditagrahaṇād ayaṃ prayuktaḥ - srotāapannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī
YXmavt:4989: tadidaṃ samāsena pañcavidhaṃ phalaṃ - bhājanatvaṃ balaṃ rucir vṛddhir
YXmavt:4991: tatra bhājanatvaṃ yaḥ kuśalānukūlo vipāka iti /
YXmavt:4999: ruciryā pūrvābhyāsāt kuśale rucir ityatīteṣu janmasu
YXmavt:5004: trayaṃ balavṛddhyor viśeṣaḥ balaṃ hi mandakuśalavipākāpekṣyaṃ dārḍhyaṃ
YXmavt:5017: asyaiva pañcavidhasya phalasya samāsoktasya prabhedaḥ samāsena nirdiṣṭaḥ
YXmavt:5034: tatra cittotpādo gotrānukūlatvāc cittotpādaḥ phalam iti /
YXmavt:5038: vipakṣa eva phalam iti vipakṣaphalaṃ prahāṇamārgo yena kleśebhyo
YXmavt:5040: ādiphalaṃ yat pūrvam uktaṃ prathamato lokottaradharmapratilambha iti /
YXmavt:5041: vipakṣaśabdo yadyapi pratipakṣavibandhanārthenāvaraṇam ucyate atra tu
YXmavt:5042: vipakṣaḥ pratipakṣo'bhipreta iti āvaraṇanirvāsapakṣo vipakṣa iti vigrahāt
YXmavt:5057: atra kāraṇam āha - tad anyayā nottaratvād iti /
YXmavt:5063: etad api samāptiphalam eva yataḥ sarvasavāsanākleśopakleśaprahāṇād
YXmavt:5066: etad anyat phalaṃ samāsanirdeśataḥ vyāsatastvaparimāṇam iti /
YXmavt:5094: aśuddhaśuddhāvasthā dve avasthe phalāvasthā sakaraṇīyāvasthā ca / [p.148]
YXmavt:5099: anuttarāvasthā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tad uttarāvasthāntarābhāvāt
YXmavt:5100: sā ca prāptyavasthā anuśaṃsāvasthā kṛtyānuṣṭhānāvasthā ca yāḥ
YXmavt:5106: tatra saṃgrahato vipākaphalādīni pañca phalāni teṣu
YXmavt:5109: teṣām eva pañcānāṃ prabhedaḥ śeṣāṇy uttarottaraphalāni veditavyāni /
YXmavt:5126: nirdeśaḥ visaṃyogaphalam abhyāsaphalasya samāptiphalasya ca nirdeśaḥ
YXmavt:5139: idānīm iti lakṣaṇādiṣaṭkanirdeśānantaram ityarthaḥ tad anantaram
YXmavt:5144: asādhāraṇam iha ca prādhānyenocyata iti pradarśayann āha -
YXmavt:5145: yānānuttaryam idānīṃ vaktavyaṃ tad ucyata iti /
YXmavt:5158: etad eva tṛtayaṃ pratipattir ālambanaṃ samudāgamaś ca /
YXmavt:5161: ālambanasya punaḥ pāramitādayo dharmā dharmadhātuś ca /
YXmavt:5165: tadvattvāt tad ālambanaṃ bodhisattvānām anuttaryam ucyate /
YXmavt:5169: sa ca tato'nyaviśiṣṭasamudāgamābhāvād anuttara ity ucyate /
YXmavt:5171: atra punaḥ pratipattir bodhisattvānāṃ sādhāra saphalā ca mahāyānam
YXmavt:5173: etac ca trividhenānuttaryeṇānantarokte nānuttaryam ity ucyate /
YXmavt:5174: atha vā mahāyānaṃ sarvavikalpaprapañcavigataṃ jñānaṃ sasamprayogaṃ
YXmavt:5179: asya ca mahāyānasyābhidhāyikā yā sūtrādideśanāpi mahāyānaṃ
YXmavt:5196: etad eva mahāyānam anuttaraṃ tad anyasya viśiṣṭayānasyābhāvāt /
YXmavt:5202: etad ānuttaryaṃ yathākramaṃ bodhisattvamārgaṃ tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tat
YXmavt:5204: etāvac ca buddhavacanenocyate - yaduta pratipattir ālambanaṃ tat
YXmavt:5209: tatra kathaṃ pratipattyānuttaryam ityata āha - pratipattyānuttaryaṃ
YXmavt:5213: sā ca pāramitāpratipattir mahāyāna eva nirdiṣṭā nānyatra yāna iti
YXmavt:5215: sā ca pratipattir yiaḥ prakāraiḥ pāramitāsu prayujyamānasyānuttarā
YXmavt:5220: sā ca pāramitāpratipattir na vijñāyate kathaṃ paramā yāvat katham
YXmavt:5221: aviśiṣṭetyata āha - tatra paramā dvādaśātmikā // iti /
YXmavt:5229: sampattir abhyudayaḥ sa ca dvidhākāraḥ - prāptaścāprāptaś ca /
YXmavt:5230: tatra prāpte na sajjate aprāptaṃ na prārthayati
YXmavt:5236: athavā loke hi dvividhā evodāra ucyate - yaḥ sthūlalakṣaḥ
YXmavt:5239: ca dānādipāramitāsu prayujyata iti tat pratipatter audāryam ucyate /
YXmavt:5242: tac ca na jñāyate kiyañciram ityata āha -
YXmavt:5250: akṣayatvaṃ punaḥ kuta ityata āha - mahābodhipariṇāmanayā'tyantam
YXmavt:5254: dharmakāyasya niṣpādanāt tasya cākṣayatvan nirupādhiśeṣe'pi nirvāṇe na
YXmavt:5259: prabhūtam apyakṣayam ucyate vipākadānenā'tyantam aparyādānāt na
YXmavt:5262: sattvadhātuvad akṣayāṇi bhavantītyataś ca sattvadhātuvan nātyantaṃ
YXmavt:5270: tataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ pratimuhūrtaṃ pratidivasaṃ ca nirantaraṃ
YXmavt:5282: tadādhipatyena hi gaganam eva gañjo bhavatīti samādhir gaganagañja
YXmavt:5283: ityabhidhīyate yasmāt tad ṛddhyā sarvopakaraṇāni gaganāj jāyante /
YXmavt:5289: tena parameṇa nirvikalpena jñānena parigṛhītā dānādipratipattiḥ kathaṃ
YXmavt:5290: tad anuparivartitatvāt tad ālambanatvāc cetyataḥ parametyucyate /
YXmavt:5299: prathamāyāṃ hi bhūmau dharmadhātoḥ sarvatragatvāvabodhāl lokottarāḥ
YXmavt:5301: laukikā evetyataḥ prathamāyāṃ bhūmau pratilambhaparamatety ucyate /
YXmavt:5307: prathamā hi bhūmir bodhisattvānāṃ darśanamārgasaṅgṛhītā tat
YXmavt:5317: daśamyāṃ hi bhūmau bodhisattvaḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāniryāta iti tatra
YXmavt:5322: sarvasya jagataḥ śāstā bhavatītyato buddhapariniṣpattyā niṣpattiḥ /
YXmavt:5325: athavā pāramitānāṃ śaikṣabhūmisaṅgṛhītānāṃ prakarṣo daśamī bhūmiḥ
YXmavt:5331: tataś ca paramārthena daśa pāramitā matāḥ / iti /
YXmavt:5332: yata eṣā dvādaśavidhā paramatā bodhisattvānāṃ dānādiṣu saṃvidyate na
YXmavt:5333: śrāvakādīnāṃ dānādiṣu tataḥ parametyanenārthena bodhisattvānām eva
YXmavt:5334: dānādayo jñānaparyantā daśa pāramitā matā iti niruktinyāyeneti /
YXmavt:5335: daśapāramitānāṃ yā pratipattiḥ sā punaḥ paramatety ucyate //5-4//
YXmavt:5336: ekeṣām iti yeṣāṃ pāramitānāṃ nāmamātram api na vyutpannaṃ teṣāṃ tan
YXmavt:5338: dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣaṃā vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā /
YXmavt:5339: praṇidānaṃ balaṃ jñānam etāḥ pāramitā daśa // iti /
YXmavt:5343: anugraho'vidhātaś ca karma tasya ca marṣaṇaṃ /
YXmavt:5357: sarvakāyavāgduścaritaviratir lokānuvṛttyā ca pratiṣiddhād vihitasya ca
YXmavt:5359: asmin śīle vyavasthānāt sattveṣvapakāraṃ duṣṭopasaṃhāraṃ jīvitahetor
YXmavt:5360: api svayaṃ na karoti nāpi kārayatīti /
YXmavt:5379: tasyāś ca karma samyag avavādadānaṃ kleśaprahāṇaṃ
YXmavt:5383: yasya dharmasya niṣpattaye vivṛddhaye prāptaye prahāṇāya vā yā yuktiḥ
YXmavt:5384: sa tatropāyas tatra kauśalyaṃ vaicakṣaṇyam upāyakauśalyaṃ /
YXmavt:5390: kuśalānukūlopapattiprārthanam atra praṇidhānam abhipretaṃ tasya janmani
YXmavt:5391: janmani buddhotpādārāgaṇato dānādiṣu sadā pravartanaṃ karma /
YXmavt:5406: yenābhiprāyikam arthaṃ tyaktvā yathārutam eva kalpayatyayaṃ
YXmavt:5408: dānam adhikṛtya dānam ālambya yaḥ sūtrādiko dharmo deśitaḥ sa
YXmavt:5426: manasikārapratipattir nānyatheti / mahāyāna iti na śrāvakayāne /
YXmavt:5427: tatra hi svārthā eva dānādayo deśitā na svaparārthā yathā mahāyāne
YXmavt:5433: te ca prāyeṇa cittasamatām asaktim anunnatim anupalaṃbhañcādhikṛtya
YXmavt:5435: tatreya cittasamatā yā guṇyaguṇināṃ samam upakāraprārthanā /
YXmavt:5436: tatreyam asaktir yo bhavabhogaprārthanāvigatasya parārtham eva dānādiṣu
YXmavt:5438: tatreyam anunnatir yad dānādibhir nātmānaṃ manyate na parān paribhavati
YXmavt:5446: sarvā hi pravṛttiḥ pralārtham ataḥ pṛcchati - sā triprākarayā
YXmavt:5447: prajñayā manasikriyā kaṃ guṇam āvahatīty ata āha -
YXmavt:5463: sā punar iyaṃ manasikārapratipattiḥ saparivārā vijñeyā na kevalā /
YXmavt:5466: saṃyuktā dharmacaritaiḥ sā jñeyā daśabhiḥ punaḥ / iti /
YXmavt:5470: tāni punar na jñāyanta ityata āha - katamad daśadhā dharmacaritam iti /
YXmavt:5474: tatra mahāyānasya svayaṃ pareṇa vā lekhanaṃ cirasthityarthaṃ
YXmavt:5482: mahatā yatnena yogyebhyo granthastyārthasya vā āviṣkaraṇaṃ prakāśanaṃ /
YXmavt:5487: tatra lekhanā pūjanā dānaṃ śravaṇam ityebhiś caturbhiḥ padaiḥ kāyakarma
YXmavt:5489: vācanam udgrahaṇaṃ prakāśanā svādhyāyanam ityebhiś caturbhiḥ padair
YXmavt:5491: cintanā bhāvanā cetyābhyām api manaḥ karma pradarśitaṃ /
YXmavt:5493: yadet daśaprakāraṃ dharmacaritam uktaṃ tata ekaikasmād dharmacaritādyaḥ
YXmavt:5494: puṇyaskandhodbhavo na sa punaḥ svayaṃ pareṇa vā pramātuṃ śakyate
YXmavt:5496: mahāyāna eva dharmacaritam atyarthaṃ mahāphalaṃ deśyate sūtreṣu na punaḥ
YXmavt:5498: sūtreṣu dharmacaritaṃ mahāphalaṃ deśyata iti sambadhyate /
YXmavt:5499: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām iti mahāyāne dharmacaritam atyarthaṃ mahāpalaṃ
YXmavt:5503: etad api na jñāyata ityataḥ pṛcchati - kathaṃ viśeṣāt kahtma akṣayatvād
YXmavt:5510: evaṃ tāvad hetusamākhyānataḥ śrāvakayānān mahāyānasya viśiṣṭatvaṃ /
YXmavt:5517: evaṃ nirvāṇe'pyanuparataṃ phalaṃ dyotanāc chrāvakayānān mahāyānaṃ
YXmavt:5522: dānādayaś ca bodhisattvānāṃ dharmā anāsravakāyatvena parivṛttāḥ
YXmavt:5524: śrāvakāṇān tu mārgasya kaulopamatvāt parinirvāṇe samucchidyata iti na
YXmavt:5526: tasmādyuktaṃ mahāyānasaiva dharmacaritaṃ mahāphalaṃ na śrāvakayāna iti
YXmavt:5537: ayam akāro bahuṣvartheṣu vartata iti kahtam avivikṣepteti na vijñāyata
YXmavt:5539: vikṣepo'pi na jñāyāte kathaṃ ṣaḍvidha ityata āha - ṣaḍvidho vikṣepaḥ -
YXmavt:5541: evam api prabhedamātraṃ darśitaṃ na vikṣepasvarūpam iti pṛcchati - sa eṣa
YXmavt:5542: ṣaḍvidho vikṣepaḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇo veditavya ityata āha -
YXmavt:5546: tatra vyutthānaṃ samādhitaḥ pañcabhir vijñānakāyair iti /
YXmavt:5547: yadā hi samāhitasya punaḥ pañcānāṃ cakṣurādivijñānānām anyatamad
YXmavt:5548: ekam utpadyate tadā samādhito vyutthito bhavati /
YXmavt:5559: yadi samāhitastameva samādhiṃ tṛṣṇādinā kleśenāsvādayati tataḥ
YXmavt:5568: atraiva kāraṇam āha - tan nimittaṃ kṛtvā prayogād iti /
YXmavt:5578: etad uktaṃ bhavati - dauṣṭhulyaprabhāvito vikṣepo dauṣṭhulyavikṣepa iti /
YXmavt:5591: atraiva kāraṇam āha - hīnayāna manasikārasamudācārād iti /
YXmavt:5594: mahāyānamanasikārebhyo vikṣipatīti hīnaṃ cittaṃ manasikāravikṣepa ity
YXmavt:5602: tatra yad yathā vyavasthitaṃ vastu tathā tatra jñānam aviparyāsaḥ /
YXmavt:5603: tad vastuta punar na jñāyate katividhe vastunītyata āha -
YXmavt:5608: idānīṃ teṣu vastuṣu yathā viparyāso bhavati tat pradarśanārtham āha -
YXmavt:5619: etad uktaṃ bhavati - aviparyastāvilambitoccāraṇam atra vyañjanānāṃ
YXmavt:5620: saṃyoga iṣyate na tu vyañjanānāṃ parasparasaṃśleṣaṇam iti /
YXmavt:5622: yadi cāsya vastuna idaṃ nāmeti saṅketo'bhyasto bhavati evam anena
YXmavt:5627: so'viparyāso vyañjane veditavya iti saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ /
YXmavt:5638: kah punar atra pratibhāsārtha ityata āha - tadākārotpattita iti /
YXmavt:5641: tathā ca na vidyate yathā pratibhāsate advayaprakṛtitvāt /
YXmavt:5642: iti evaṃ bhrāntivijñānotpattinimittabhūte'rthe yad darśanaṃ sa
YXmavt:5644: arthasya sattvena varjita ityatraiva kāraṇam āha -
YXmavt:5653: ayam api saṃvṛttā'viparyāsa ucyate na paramārthataḥ savikalpatvāt /
YXmavt:5662: vāṅmanobhyāṃ yad abhilapanaṃ sa jalpa ity ucyate /
YXmavt:5671: punaś ca jalpasya tat sanniśrayeṇotpāter āśrayo bhavatītyayaṃ
YXmavt:5673: sa tu manaskāro na vijṇyāte yasminn aviparyāsa ityataḥ pṛcchati - katam
YXmavt:5688: evaṃ tad dauṣṭhulyaṃ sukhena varjitaṃ bhavatīti // [p.165]
YXmavt:5698: etad eva pradarśayann āha -yathā māyā svātmanyavidyamānena
YXmavt:5701: kiṃ tarhi na ca naivāsti tad bhrāntimātrāstitvād iti /
YXmavt:5704: tathārtho'pi na cāsti yathā samprakhyāti grāhyagrāhakatvena tathā
YXmavt:5708: ādiśabdena marīcisvapnodakacandrādayo dṛṣṭāntā yathāyogaṃ veditavyā iti /
YXmavt:5710: tathā santi na ca santyeva bhrāntimātrāstitvāt evam artho'pīti
YXmavt:5713: evaṃ yan māyādyupamārthadarśanāt sattvāsattvapakṣayor avisāraṃ cetasaḥ
YXmavt:5717: yadyevaṃ katham avisāre'viparyāsa ityata āha - tena
YXmavt:5722: ayam api saṃvṛttyairvāviparyāso na paramārthataḥ tasya nirvikalpakatvāt
YXmavt:5726: sarvam idaṃ nāmamātraṃ yadidaṃ cakṣūrūpaṃ yāvan manodharmā iti /
YXmavt:5729: na ca prajñaptyasyārthasya prajñapter vā svabhāvo'sti /
YXmavt:5733: tasmāc cakṣūrupam ityādyasyātat svabhāvatvān nāmamātram eva
YXmavt:5734: cakṣūrūpaṃ yāvan manodharmā ityevaṃ yaj jñānaṃ sarvavikalpānāṃ
YXmavt:5739: tatra na jñāyate kiṃ paramārthe svalakṣaṇe āhosvit saṃvṛtāv ityataḥ
YXmavt:5746: saṃvṛttyā yato nedaṃ nāmamātram iti gṛhyate abhilāpadvāreṇa
YXmavt:5747: dharmasvarūpe saṅkalpapravṛtteḥ ayam api saṃvṛtyaiva na paramārthato
YXmavt:5753: na hi dharmanairātmyena vinā kaścid rūpyarūpī vā dharmo vidyate /
YXmavt:5756: tasmād dharmadhātuḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇam iti /
YXmavt:5757: sarvadharmeṣv apṛthaktvena tat sat sāmānyalakṣaṇam ucyate /
YXmavt:5758: yadevaṃ jñānamayaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇo'viparyāsaḥ saṃvṛttyā na tu
YXmavt:5761: tad anena cāviparyāsena bodhisattvo viśuddhyālambanakuśalo bhavati
YXmavt:5768: evaṃ darśanabhedavaśād viśeṣo bhavati na tv arthād iti /
YXmavt:5772: viparyasta manaskāraprahāṇaṃ tasya dharmadhātor aviśuddhiḥ tat prahāṇaṃ
YXmavt:5776: yadevaṃ jñānamayam aviśuddhau viśuddhau cāviparyāso yathākramam iti /
YXmavt:5777: viparyasta manaskārāprahāṇaṃ tasya dharmadhātor aviśuddhir iti
YXmavt:5779: tasya prahāṇaṃ viśuddhir iti viśuddhāv aviparyāsaḥ /
YXmavt:5790: apyetadāgantukam aviśuddhir viśuddhiś ca paścād iti /
YXmavt:5792: paścāc ca pratipakṣodayena tat prahāṇād viśuddhiḥ /
YXmavt:5796: prakṛtiviśuddhasyāviśuddhir āgantukī bhaved viśuddhes tu nityaviśuddhitaḥ
YXmavt:5798: yā malavigamatātmatayā viśuddhiḥ sātra vivakṣiteti nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
YXmavt:5799: ata evoktaṃ viśuddhiś ca paścād iti /
YXmavt:5800: yadevaṃ dharmadhātor jñānam etad dharmadhātor viśuddhi viśuddhyor
YXmavt:5802: ayam api saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ /
YXmavt:5806: saṅkleśaś ca viśuddhiś ca dharmapudgalayor na hi /
YXmavt:5808: na hi pudgalasya saṅkleśo na viśuddhiḥ nāpi dharmasya /
YXmavt:5810: atraiva kāraṇam āha - yasmān na pudgalo'sti na dharmaḥ /
YXmavt:5812: yaḥ saṅkleśavyavadānavyatirekeṇa vidyate yasya saṅkleśo vyavadānaṃ vā
YXmavt:5813: parikalpayituṃ yujyate yat pṛthaktvena ca saṃkleśaviśuddhī syātāṃ sa
YXmavt:5815: dharmo'pi parikalpitātmako naivāsti ekasminn vastuny ekaparikalpapravṛtteḥ
YXmavt:5821: yadi paratantrasyāpi neṣyate kasya te syātāṃ ?
YXmavt:5823: dharmadhātoḥ saṅkleśaviśuddhī bhavata ity ayam adoṣaḥ /
YXmavt:5824: dharmadhātor apyatanmayasyaiva te vyavasthāpyete dharmadhātau tayor
YXmavt:5826: tataḥ na saṃkleśapakṣe kasyacid hānir na vyavadānapakṣe vā kaścid viśeṣo
YXmavt:5827: yatas trāso vā syān mānovetyamatrāse'nunnatau cāviparyāsa iti /
YXmavt:5828: anye tvāhuḥ - na saṅkleśapakṣe kasyacid hānir na vyavadānapakṣe
YXmavt:5830: yataḥ punas ta evaṃ bhavatas tatra kim iti trāso bhavaty ayaṃ me nāstīti
YXmavt:5831: kim iti māno bhavaty ayaṃ me viśeṣa iti / [p.169]
YXmavt:5832: apare tu manyate - pudgalas tāvan naivāsti /
YXmavt:5835: kiṃ tarhi pratītyasamutpādamātram etat saṅkleśavyavadānam iti /
YXmavt:5836: ayam api saṃvṛttyā na tu paramārthataḥ tasya nirvikalpakatvāt /
YXmavt:5839: anena cāviparyāsena sarvam āvaraṇaṃ prahāya nirāvaraṇo niryātītyanye
YXmavt:5842: anyaḥ punar āha - ya ete vyañjane'rthe manaskāre'visāre svalakṣaṇe
YXmavt:5845: tatra vyañjanārthāviparyāsāv atra parikalpitaṃ svabhāvam adhikṛtya /
YXmavt:5847: atattvaviṣayatve'pi satyevaṃ tad dvayam aviparyāsa eva /
YXmavt:5852: kuta etan nirvikalpasya jñānasya bhāvābhāvayor vikṣepavigatatvād
YXmavt:5857: āgantuke'viparyāso dharmadhātāv eva tasya hy ākāśavat
YXmavt:5858: prakṛtiviśuddhasya cittasaṅkleśāc cittaviśuddhyā cāgantukam etad ubhayaṃ
YXmavt:5862: evam ete daśa viparyāsāḥ svabhāvatraye veditavyāḥ /
YXmavt:5864: ete cānantaroktā daśaviparyāsāḥ sūtrokteṣu daśasu vajrapadeṣu
YXmavt:5871: anantaroktam aviparyāsajñānaṃ tac ca vajram ebhiḥ pratīyate avagamyata
YXmavt:5874: atha punarvyañjanārthamanaskārādaya eva padaśabdhenocyante tato vajrasya
YXmavt:5876: athava durbhedatayā vajravadetānyeva padāni vajra padānītyuccayante /
YXmavt:5880: tatra vyañjanānām arthasattvam asattvañca sadasattetyato vyañjaneṣv
YXmavt:5883: sa ca tathā na vidyata ityayam atrāviparyāsa ityarthāviparyāso
YXmavt:5901: evam ete daśāviparyāsā daśasu vajrapadeṣu yathākramaṃ yojayitavyāḥ /
YXmavt:5904: teṣāntu caturdhā vyavasthānaṃ svabhāvataḥ ālambanataḥ avikalpanataḥ
YXmavt:5908: tatrādau bhavānyādyāni tāni punaḥ sadasattā'viparyāsa āśrayaśceti /
YXmavt:5913: pariniṣpannasya sadasattāyā sadasattayā nirdeśa iti kecit /
YXmavt:5914: kathaṃ sadasal lakṣaṇatvāt pariniṣpannasya sadasattayā'bhidhānam ityeke /
YXmavt:5916: viparyayāc ca nirarthakatvaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo'nabhilāpya iti
YXmavt:5918: atas tat sadasattā pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāva ity uktam ityanye /
YXmavt:5920: viparyāsapratipakṣālambanatvāc ca pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāva ity ucyate /
YXmavt:5921: so'rthaḥ kalpitasvabhāvasya bhavati na tu parikalpitaḥ /
YXmavt:5923: anye tv āhuḥ - sadasattā'viparyastatvāt pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāva ukta iti
YXmavt:5927: hetutvād āśraya ity ucyate phalatvāt paratantra iti /
YXmavt:5929: avikalpanata ityatra vigrahabhedād āha - yena ca vikalpayati nirvikalpena
YXmavt:5930: jñānena yac ca na vikalpayati prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ /
YXmavt:5931: tatrārya vigrahabhedaḥ - na vikalpayatyanenetyavikalpanaṃ na vikalpyate
YXmavt:5934: evam avikalpanatā dvābhyāṃ vajrapadābhyāṃ paridīpiteti darśayati /
YXmavt:5935: tad anena jñeyajñānavyavasthānaṃ yathākramaṃ veditavyaṃ yad uta tribhiḥ
YXmavt:5940: atra kiñcid vajrapradaṃ codyasya parihāra eva /
YXmavt:5944: tasmācodyaparihāraś ca codyasya parihāraś ca codyaparihārau
YXmavt:5946: tatra codyaṃ yadyete parikalpitaparatantralakṣaṇā dharmā na saṃvidyante
YXmavt:5949: ata saṃvidyante dharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā na yujyate
YXmavt:5953: yathā māyākṛtaṃ na saṃvidyata upalabhyate ceti /
YXmavt:5954: na hi māyopalabhyatayā saṃvidyate tato'pyevaṃ saṃvidyata iti jñātuṃ
YXmavt:5956: yadi parkṛtiprabhāsvaratā dharmāṇāṃ tat kathaṃ pūrvaṃ saṃkleśaḥ paścād
YXmavt:5963: tad apagamāc ca vyavadānam iti yadyaprameyabuddhotpāde satyaprameyāṇāṃ
YXmavt:5966: ca na saṃsārasamucchedo na nirvāṇavṛddhri veti codyaṃ /
YXmavt:5969: parimāṇavato hi vastuno hāniḥ samucchedo vā prajñāyate aprameyaś ca
YXmavt:5971: tasya hānir api na prajñāte kuta eva samucchedaḥ prajñāsyeta ākāśavat
YXmavt:5972: vyavadānasyāpyaprameyatvād viśeṣa eva nāsti tasya kathaṃ vṛddhir
YXmavt:5975: dvitīyaṃ śarīravyavasthānam iti vajrapadānām ity adhikṛtaṃ /
YXmavt:5976: yatra yā ca yato bhrāntir abhrāntir yā ca yatra ca /
YXmavt:5977: bhrāntyabhrāntiphale caiva paryantaś ca tayor iti //
YXmavt:5981: tatra yatra bhrāntir iti sadasattāyāṃ vyañjanānāṃ
YXmavt:5984: yā ca bhrāntir iti viparyāso bhrāntiḥ /
YXmavt:5986: yato bhrāntir ityāśrayād bhrāntir āśrayaḥ punar jalpaparibhāvito
YXmavt:5988: abhrāntir yā ceti māyādivad arthataḥ sadasattāvisāro'bhrāntiḥ /
YXmavt:5994: bhrāntyabhrāntiphale caiveti tatra bhrāntiphalaṃ hi saṅkleśaḥ /
YXmavt:5998: evakārakaraṇaṃ tat phale saṅkleśo vyavadānam ityanenaivokte
YXmavt:5999: ākāśopamatayā tu paśyati dharmadhātor yasya bhrāntyabhrāntiphalaṃ tat
YXmavt:6002: paryantaś ca tayor iti saṅkleśavyavadānayoḥ paryanto nirvāṇaṃ /
YXmavt:6010: akalpanā prakṛtyā ca bhāsvaratvaṃ sadaiva hi //
YXmavt:6030: pṛcchati - antadvayavarjane pratipattiḥ katametyata āha - yā ratnakūṭe
YXmavt:6033: tadyathā - kāśyapa iha mahāratnakūṭe dharmaparyāye śikṣitukāmena
YXmavt:6042: katam asyāntasya varjanān madhyamā pratipatter jñātavyetyarthaḥ /
YXmavt:6050: tatra rūpādibhyaḥ pṛthaktvam ātmana ityantaḥ ekatvam ityantaḥ /
YXmavt:6051: tatra ye rūpādīn sknadhānāyatanāni dhātūṃś ca nityātmana
YXmavt:6052: upabhogavastutvena kalpayanti tad rūpādibhyaḥ pṛthaktvamātmana ityantaḥ /
YXmavt:6053: ye punar ādhyātmikān saṃskārān rūpādīnām ātmatvena pratipannā yaḥ
YXmavt:6054: paśyati śṛṇoti jānāti sa ātmeti bāhyāṃścātmīyatvena kalpayanti tad
YXmavt:6055: rūpādibhya ekatvam ātmana ityantaḥ yat sūtryate - sa jīvas taccharīram
YXmavt:6059: madhyamā pratipad yad dharmātraṃ viṣayabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ /
YXmavt:6060: etad eva pradarśayann āha - yā nātmapratyavekṣā
YXmavt:6063: kuta eva tasya rūpādibhyas tattvam anyatvaṃ vā gṛhyata iti ?
YXmavt:6066: na sarvasya sarvaparyāyavyutpattir ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ tadarthāvabodhārthaṃ
YXmavt:6071: te hi parikalpitarūpān vastutvenābhiniveśya nityatvena kalpayanti
YXmavt:6082: yan na rūpādīn rūpādiṣv eva nityatvenānityatvena cānugacchati /
YXmavt:6087: ātmeti śabdena pudgalasamāropānta iti skandhadhātvāyatana vyatiriktam
YXmavt:6088: avyatiriktaṃ vā vandhyāputravad asantam ātmānaṃ dravyataḥ paśyataḥ
YXmavt:6092: ātmanastv asattvāt kathaṃ nairātmyam ity apavādānta āpadyata ityata
YXmavt:6093: āha - prajñaptisato'pyapavādāt nairātmyam apavādānta iti sambadhyate
YXmavt:6094: sa punar dharmāṇāṃ santāno yasmin hetuphalasambandhaḥ prajñāyate /
YXmavt:6098: tasyāḥ punar yasyā madhyamāyāḥ pratipado nirūpaṇārtham āha -
YXmavt:6106: yathā pratibhāsate yathā vā'bhilapyate cittaṃ tathaiva bhūtaṃ vidyata
YXmavt:6110: tasya hi grāhyagrāhakarahitātmanā nirabhilāpyena ca vidyamānam
YXmavt:6115: sā yatra nacittaṃ na cetanā na mano na vijñānam iti /
YXmavt:6117: yatra vā viṣaye na cittaṃ sāsravavāsanābhiścittātmakaṃ pravartate na
YXmavt:6118: cetanā'bhisaṃskāralakṣaṇā na mano manyanākāraṃ na vijñānañca
YXmavt:6130: tatra yathaivākuśalāḥ kuśalāś ca dharmāḥ pratibhāsante'bhilapyante ca
YXmavt:6131: tathaiva saṃkleśo vyavadānañceti darśanaṃ vipakṣāntaḥ pratipakṣāntaś ca
YXmavt:6140: na madhyamā'tra pratipaj jñāyata ityata āha -
YXmavt:6147: astīti śāśvatāntaḥ nāstītyucchedāntaḥ tayor eva pudgaladharmayoḥ /
YXmavt:6150: tat parivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad anayor antayor madhyamiti/
YXmavt:6154: yo'hyabhūtaparikalpavad dharmadhātuvadvā jñeyamn abhidheyaṃ ca vastu
YXmavt:6161: ataścāstitva nāstitvayor madhyaṃ dravyaḥ paramārthaś ca nasti
YXmavt:6165: evaṃ vidyā saṃskārā asaṃskṛtañca tat pratipakṣo grāhyaṃ
YXmavt:6167: atra ca yāvaj jarāmaraṇam iti paryantagrahāṇād
YXmavt:6170: evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo
YXmavt:6181: anye tv anutpattimatvād asaṃskṛtam aṣṭavidham apyatra manyante /
YXmavt:6185: nirodho na vijñāyate kiṃ bhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ vetyāha - yena tan nāmarūpaṃ
YXmavt:6189: vidyā cā'vidyā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram ityetad evātra jñānaṃ
YXmavt:6197: tatra kṛṣṇapakṣe dvādaśabhavāṅgāni avidyā yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ /
YXmavt:6200: atra ca nirydhyante'enā'vidyādaya iti tat pratipakṣabhūto mārga eva
YXmavt:6204: sā ca na vijñāyata ityata āha - vidyā cā'vidyā cādvayam etad iti /
YXmavt:6205: kathaṃ vidyā cāvidyā ca yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ tan nirodhaścā'dvayam ityata
YXmavt:6210: evaṃ saṃskārāṇām asaṃskṛtasya ca vijñānasya tan nirodhasya ca yāvaj
YXmavt:6213: etad eva jñānaṃ vidyā cāvidyā cādvayam etadavaidhīkāram iti na
YXmavt:6216: na tannirodhaḥ prāptavya iti yadevaṃ jñānam etadavaidhīkāraṃ // [p.179]
YXmavt:6220: karmāpi kleśādhipatyanirvṛttatvāj janmahetutvāt svayam api ca kasyacit
YXmavt:6226: rāgadveṣamohā eva nimittaṃ śokādihetutvāt punar bhavahetutvāc ca /
YXmavt:6227: anye tvāhuḥ - rāgādīnāṃ nimittaṃ tad anukūlā indriyārthāḥ ayoniśo
YXmavt:6243: yena jñānena karma punarbhavann asya nā'bhisaṃskaroti taj jñānaṃ
YXmavt:6253: yasya pratipakṣo jñānā'jātir jñānānutpādo jñānāsvabhāvatā ca /
YXmavt:6258: vandhyāputravad asattvād asvabhāvo bhāvaprabandha iti yaj jñānaṃ taj
YXmavt:6265: anye tu manyante tathatā mārgo nirvāṇañca vyavadānaṃ /
YXmavt:6275: etena trividhena saṅkleśena yathāyogaṃ yāvan na śūnyatādayaḥ kriyanta iti /
YXmavt:6284: ato jñeyaśūnyatādayo dharmāḥ prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādaya iti
YXmavt:6287: jñānaśūnyatayā jñeyaśūnyatā dṛṣṭisaṃkleśena vimuktā virahitā na
YXmavt:6289: evaṃ jñānānimittena jñeyānimittaṃ rāgādinimittair virahitaṃ na
YXmavt:6295: jñānājāthyā jñeyajātirṇaṃ kriyate, jātiśūnyatāyāḥ prakṛutyai vā
YXmavt:6301: athavā trividhena saṃkleśena yathāyogam iti vistaraḥ /
YXmavt:6303: dharmāṇāṃ yasya dharmasya yena saṃkleśabhedena yogaḥ sa dharmo na
YXmavt:6308: yasmāt te prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādayo dharmā dharmadhātoḥ
YXmavt:6310: tatra dṛṣṭayo na jñānaśūnyatayā śūnyāḥ kriyante tāsāṃ prakṛtyaiva
YXmavt:6314: evaṃ yāvat punar bhavaprabandho jñānāsvabhāvatayā nāsvabhāvaḥ
YXmavt:6316: yataścaitad evam ato yadi dharmadhātuḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśuddhyate veti
YXmavt:6318: kiṃ kāraṇam ityato bravīti - prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭasya saṃkleśaśuddhyabhāvād
YXmavt:6320: etasyāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ madhyamāpratipad yan na śūnyatāyā
YXmavt:6322: tad vipakṣeṇa paratantrasvabhāvena dṛṣṭyādikena śūnyān virahitān karoti
YXmavt:6323: api tv anutpannāyām api vidyāyāṃ parikalpitena svabhāvena
YXmavt:6325: evaṃ yannānimittena dharmānanimittān karoti dharmā evānimittāḥ
YXmavt:6328: yaivaṃ pratyavekṣā iyam ucyate kāśyapa dharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣeti /
YXmavt:6329: evaṃ vidyāstitvaṃ tad vipakṣāstitvāṃ ca parikalpitasvabhāvavigataṃ
YXmavt:6331: yo'yam anukrānto vikalpaprabhedastasmād ayam aparaḥ saptavidho
YXmavt:6335: katham ityato bravīti - pudgalo'sti yasya vināśāya śūnyatā nairātmyam
YXmavt:6337: yadi śūnyatayā dharmān prakṛtiśūnyatvān na śūnyān karoti tena tarhi
YXmavt:6341: tasmād avaśyaṃ pudgalāstitvaṃ vā nairātmyaṃ bhāvo vā pratipattavya iti
YXmavt:6345: na khalu punaḥ kāśyapa pudgalavināśāya śūnyatā /
YXmavt:6346: api tu śūnyataiva śūnyeti vistareṇa sūtrapāṭhaḥ /
YXmavt:6347: tatra na saṅkliṣṭa pudugalavināśāya na oyavadānpudgalothpādāya
YXmavt:6349: tu śūnyataiva śūnyā na tu pudgalena satkāyadṛṣṭisamāropitena
YXmavt:6351: evañca kṛtvā pudgaladharmātmanā na bhāvaḥ śūunyatā tad rahitatvāt /
YXmavt:6352: pariniṣpannena nābhāvaḥ tac ca śūnyatāyāḥ pariniṣpannātmakatvaṃ
YXmavt:6358: yasmāc caivaṃ bhāvābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā tasmād āha - śūnyatāṃ
YXmavt:6362: katham ityata āha - praheyaprahāṇakalpanayā śūnyatāyās trasanāditi /
YXmavt:6368: sa yadi prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tataḥ pudgalavan na praheyaḥ syāt /
YXmavt:6369: tataś ca praheyābhāvāt prahāṇābhāva iti śūnyatāyām uttrāso jāyate
YXmavt:6372: rūpavedanādayo hi dharmā yathaiva vijñānātmani viparivartante tathaiva
YXmavt:6373: te dravyataḥ santītyabhiniviṣṭāḥ teṣāṃ kalpitarūpāṇāṃ rūpādīnām
YXmavt:6376: tadyathā - kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣa ākāśajo bhītaḥ sorastāḍaṃ
YXmavt:6378: takiṃ manyase kāśyapa śakyam ākāśam apanetuṃ ?
YXmavt:6380: bhagavān āha - evam eva kāśyapa ete śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ śūnyatāyām
YXmavt:6383: śūnyatāyām eva hi te kāśyapa vicaranti tasyā eva bibhyantīti /
YXmavt:6384: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yathākāśaṃ sarvarūpānugatatvād apanetum aśakyam
YXmavt:6385: evaṃ sarvadharmeṣu sarvakālaṃ śūnyatā vyavasthitetyapanetuṃ na śakyate /
YXmavt:6386: na ca dharmaprahāṇena śūnyatā vyavasthāpayitum ataścāyam
YXmavt:6388: trāsye'pi kalpo'ntaḥ tataś ca trāsyād bhaye'pi /
YXmavt:6393: tasmād yad aniṣṭaphalaṃ tasmin strāsye tasmiṃśca bhaye yo vikalpayati
YXmavt:6396: bālā hi parikalpitarūpādīn vastutaḥ kalpayitvā tebhyo bhayam aniṣṭaṃ
YXmavt:6398: tataśca duḥkhabhīrutayā tebhyo rūpādibhyas tan nimittebhyaś ca bhayāt
YXmavt:6402: tadyathā - kāśyapa citrakaraḥ svayam eva bhīṣaṇaṃ yakṣarūpaṃ kṛtvā
YXmavt:6403: tasmād eva bhītasrasto'dhomukho nipatya sammohaṃ nigacchet /
YXmavt:6404: evam eva kāśyapa sarvabālapṛthagjanāḥ svayam eva
YXmavt:6405: rūpaśabdagandharasasparśān kṛtvā tebhyaḥ saṃsāre bhrāmyanti na ca tān
YXmavt:6407: yathā ca citrakaraḥ svayaṃkṛte bhīṣaṇake yakṣarūpe mithyāvikalpena
YXmavt:6408: bhūtayakṣabhāvam adhyāropya tasmād bhītaḥ sammoham āpadyate /
YXmavt:6409: evaṃ sarva eva bālā mithyāvikalpaprasrutāḥ svayaṃ kṛtair iti vikalpitaiḥ
YXmavt:6412: śrāvako hi śūnyatāyām akṛtaparicayatvāc chūnyatāyās trasyati /
YXmavt:6415: nānayor arthaviśeṣo'styapi tu vargadvayavaśād dvayābhidhānam ityanye /
YXmavt:6418: pūrvaka ātmagrāhapratipakṣeṇa ayaṃ punar dharmagrāhapratipakṣeṇeti kecit
YXmavt:6421: katham ete grāhyarūpādayas tad grāhakāśca vijñānakāyāḥ
YXmavt:6422: svalakṣaṇataḥ kāryataś ca gṛhyamāṇā ātmādivad adhyāropitātmāno
YXmavt:6426: tadyathā kāśyapa māyākāraḥ puruṣo māyākṛtaṃ nirmimīti /
YXmavt:6427: atha sa māyānirmitas tameva māyākāraṃ khādet /
YXmavt:6428: evam eva kāśyapa yogācāro bhikṣur yadyadevārambaṇaṃ manaskaroti tat
YXmavt:6429: sarvam asya riktam eva khyātīti vistaraḥ /
YXmavt:6433: arthābhāve vijñaptyasambhavād ityetad atra sādharmyam iti /
YXmavt:6437: yathā nirmito nirmātāraṃ bhakṣyedevam arthābhāvajñānaṃ tadeva
YXmavt:6448: atha punar asamyaktvalakṣaṇam eva evam api mithyātvam evopapadyate
YXmavt:6451: tadyathā kāśYapa kāṣṭhadvayaṃ pratītyagnir jāyata iti jātaś ca
YXmavt:6453: evam eva kāśyapa bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ pratītyāryaṃ prajñendriyaṃ jāyate
YXmavt:6454: jātaṃ ca tām eva bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ dahatīti /
YXmavt:6455: amamātrārthaḥ - yathā kāṣṭhadvayād anagnilakṣaṇād agnir jāyate
YXmavt:6459: jātaś ca tām eva bhūtaparatyavekṣāṃ dahati /
YXmavt:6461: sā hi vibhāvanād eva dagdheva dagdhety ucyate vikṛtidarśanāt /
YXmavt:6466: katham ityata āha - jñānasya buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ niḥsāmarthyaṃ vā
YXmavt:6469: jñānam idam ajñānaṃ prajahāmītyavadhārya tat prahāṇāya pravartata
YXmavt:6474: tadyathā kāśyapa tailapradyote kṛte tamo'ndhakāraṃ vigacchati na khalu
YXmavt:6475: punaḥ kāśyapa tailapradyotasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvam andhakāraṃ
YXmavt:6477: api tu khalu tailapradyotaṃ pratītya tamo'ndhakāraṃ vigacchatīti /
YXmavt:6478: evam eva kāśyapa jñāna utpanne'jñānaṃ vigacchati na khalu punaḥ
YXmavt:6479: kāśyapa jñānasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham ajñānaṃ vidhamāmīti /
YXmavt:6480: api tu khalu jñānaṃ pratītyājñānaṃ vigacchatīti /
YXmavt:6481: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yathā pradīpo vyāpāraśūnyas
YXmavt:6482: tamo'ndhakāravyudāsābhiprāyarahitaś ca punar yasmin pradeśe kriyate
YXmavt:6484: evam eva yasmin santāne nirvikalpaṃ jñānam utpadyate tat
YXmavt:6485: sattāmātrasadbhāvād eva tasmāt santānād ajñānaṃ vigacchati
YXmavt:6491: katham ityata āha - yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā kalpayati yatheyatā
YXmavt:6492: kālena notpannapūrvaḥ pratipakṣas tathedānīm api notpatsyata iti ayam
YXmavt:6495: na hy ajñāne jñānapratiyoginyavasthita eva jñānam utpattuṃ samarthaṃ /
YXmavt:6496: athāpi kathañcid utpadyeta tathāpi cirakālaviruddhatvād ajñānasya na
YXmavt:6497: jñānena tat kṣaṇikena vyudāsaḥ śakyate kartuṃ /
YXmavt:6501: tadyathā kāśyapa gṛhe vā layane vā'vacarake vā varṣasahasrasyātyayān
YXmavt:6503: atha tatra kaścid eva puruṣas tailapradyotaṃ kuryāt /
YXmavt:6504: tat kiṃ manyase kāśyapāpi tu tamo'ndhākārasyaivaṃ bhaved
YXmavt:6506: āha - no bhagavan na hi tamo'ndhakārasya śaktir asti tailapradyote kṛte na
YXmavt:6508: bhagavān āha - evam eva kāśyapa kalpaśatasahasrasañcito'pi karmakleśa
YXmavt:6519: antadvayavarjanapratipatter anantaraṃ viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca pratipattir
YXmavt:6523: viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca jñeyā daśasu bhūmiṣu //
YXmavt:6524: tāsu daśasu bhūmiṣv ekaikaśo dviprakārāpi pratipattiḥ /
YXmavt:6525: katham ityata āha - yasyāṃ bhūmau yā pāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavatīti
YXmavt:6527: yasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau vyavasthito boshisattvo yasyāṃ pāramitāyām
YXmavt:6528: ādhikyena prayujyate sā tasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmāv itarābhyaḥ
YXmavt:6533: aviśeṣeṇa śeṣāsu sarvāsu pāramitāsu tasyāṃ bhūmau samudāgacchatīti
YXmavt:6536: na ca śeṣāsu na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhājamānam iti /
YXmavt:6537: evaṃ śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu yathāsūtraṃ nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
YXmavt:6545: ityetad dvādaśavidham ālambanaṃ vyavasthānālambanam ārabhya yāvat
YXmavt:6548: tatra prathamaṃ ye pāramitādayo dharmāste'pi buddhair bodhisattvaiś ca
YXmavt:6554: tayā vyavatiṣṭhate sā vā'tra vyavasthānam iti
YXmavt:6562: yathākramam iti prathamaṃ sādhyālambanaṃ dvitīyaṃ sādhanālambanaṃ /
YXmavt:6572: tat punaḥ prathamam eva dvayaṃ vyavasthānālambanaṃ
YXmavt:6590: navamaṃ bhāvanāmārgasya yāvat saptamyāṃ bhūmāv iti /
YXmavt:6594: daśamaṃ tatraiva laukikalokottarasya mārgasyālambanam iti prakṛtaṃ /
YXmavt:6599: sa eva bhāvanāmārga ucyate saptamyām eva bhūmau /
YXmavt:6610: anyaḥ punar āha - mārgaprakarṣasyaiva mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedaṃ kṛtvā
YXmavt:6612: tadeva hi prathamadvayaṃ tasyāṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ tat tadālambananāma
YXmavt:6616: taccaitad ālambanadvayaṃ tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jñānāvasthāyāṃ tat tan nāma
YXmavt:6622: navamyāṃ daśamyāṃ buddhabhūmau ca prakarṣāprāptaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ
YXmavt:6629: tayā tayā pratipattyā samudānīyata iti samudāgamaḥ /
YXmavt:6630: tad anyebhyaḥ samudāgamebhyo viśiṣṭatvāt tataścānyasya samudāgamasya
YXmavt:6635: tatra pratyayāvaikalyam ārabhya yāvad bodhisandarśanam ityeṣa daśavidhaḥ
YXmavt:6639: teṣv āhṛteṣu gotraṃ samudāgaccyati sphītaṃ tad viśiṣṭataraṃ
YXmavt:6641: tat punaḥ satpuruṣasaṃsevā saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāra ityevam
YXmavt:6649: śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam asya na krāmatyevam asya tad
YXmavt:6657: sa yatra nāsti sā nyāmā nivātavadanāsravā bhūmiḥ
YXmavt:6660: tathā hy utpannadarśanamārgo niyato bhavati sugatau nirvāṇe ceti /
YXmavt:6666: anye tvāhuḥ - evam asya sattvaparipākaḥ samudāgato bhavatiḥ yadyanena
YXmavt:6674: yānānuttaryasya piṇḍārtha iti pūrvaṃ piṇḍārthākhyānaprayojanam ucyate
YXmavt:6675: samāsatas trividham ānuttaryam iti vyāsato'nantam iti /
YXmavt:6691: saṃyuktā dharmacaritaiḥ sā jñeyā daśabhiḥ punaḥ / iti /
YXmavt:6696: yad arthañca madhyamayā pratipadā niryāṇārtham ityantadvayavarjane
